column2: 查看通道的所有值的值，並將單個數字結果輸出到輸出中。
column3: Looks at the values of all the values of a channel, and outputs a single-number result into the output.

column2: 是度，弧度，四元數和向量之間的通用轉換器。不同的格式假定輸入通道的特定順序。
column3: Is a general purpose converter between degrees, radians, quaternions and vectors.  Different formats assume a specific ordering of input channels.

column2: 添加，刪除或更新輸入CHOP的屬性。目前只有一種屬性類型，即“四元數”。
column3: Adds, removes or updates attributes of the input CHOP. Currently there is only one attribute type, a "quaternion".

column2: 使用DirectSound或ASIO從任何連接的音頻輸入設備接收音頻。它總是輸出時間切片的音頻數據。
column3: Receives audio from any of the attached audio input devices using DirectSound or ASIO. It always outputs time sliced audio data.

column2: 旨在控制音頻信號的動態範圍。動態範圍是指音頻在一段時間內的響度和安靜程度。
column3: Is designed to control the dynamic range of an audio signal. Dynamic range refers to how loud and quiet the audio is over some period of time.

column2: 消除低頻，高頻，低頻和高頻，或消除中頻範圍。低通濾波器可消除較高頻率的聲音，而高通濾波器可降低聲音的低音。
column3: Removes low frequencies, high frequencies, both low and high, or removes a mid-frequency range. A Low pass filter removes the higher frequencies of a sound, while a high pass filter reduces the bass of the sound.

column2: 可以從任何rtsp服務器將音頻流傳輸到TouchDesigner。
column3: Can stream audio into TouchDesigner from any rtsp server.

column2: 可以將音頻流傳輸到任何rtsp客戶端，例如VideoLAN的VLC媒體播放器和Apple的Quicktime。要在其中一個播放器中訪問流，請在“文件”菜單下打開“網絡流”或“URL”。
column3: Can stream audio out to any rtsp client such as VideoLAN's VLC media player and Apple's Quicktime. To access the stream in one of these players, open a "Network Stream" or "URL" under the File menu.

column2: 是一個16波段均衡器，它以與傳統波段（圖形）均衡器使用一組滑塊來過濾固定頻率的聲音相同的方式過濾音頻輸入通道。
column3: Is a 16-band equalizer which filters audio input channels in the same way that a conventional band (graphic) equalizer uses a bank of sliders to filter fixed-frequency bands of sound.

column2: 生成各種斜坡，脈沖和計數器，這些斜坡，脈沖和計數器定時到每分鐘的節拍和由節拍對話或節拍命令產生的同步。
column3: Generates a variety of ramps, pulses and counters that are timed to the beats per minute and the sync produced by the Beat Dialog or the beat Command .

column2: 通過在輸入1中使用一組混合通道，在輸入2,3等中組合兩個或更多個CHOP。混合通道導致CHOP的不同強度有助於CHOP的輸出。
column3: Combines two or more CHOPs in input 2, 3 and so on, by using a set of blending channels in input 1. The blending channels cause different strengths of the CHOPs to contribute to the output of the CHOP.

column2: 生成反映年，月，週，日，小時，分鐘，秒和毫秒時間的頻道。
column3: Generates channels that reflect the time of year, month, week, day, hour, minute, second and millisecond.

column2: 在另一個CHOP的通道上層疊（混合）一個CHOP的通道。第一個輸入是基本輸入，第二個是層輸入。
column3: Layers (blends) the channels of one CHOP on the channels of another CHOP. The first input is the base input and the second is the layer input.

column2: 創建多達40個新的恆定價值渠道。每個通道都可以命名並分配不同的值。
column3: Creates up to forty new constant-value channels. Each channel can be named and assigned a different value.

column2: 沿第一個輸入的時間軸生成第二個輸入的多個副本。第一個輸入提供觸發信號或卷積電平。
column3: Produces multiple copies of the second input along the timeline of the first input. The first input provides the trigger signals or the convolve levels.

column2: 計算通道越過觸發或釋放閾值的次數。它以靜態或實時（“Cook to Current Frame”）模式運行。
column3: Counts the number of times a channel crosses a trigger or release threshold. It operates in either static or realtime ("Cook to Current Frame") mode.

column2: 是一個多輸入OP，一次混合2個輸入。這類似於Switch CHOP，但Cross CHOP允許在輸入之間進行插值。
column3: Is a multi input OP that blends between 2 inputs at a time. This is similar to a Switch CHOP however the Cross CHOP allows for interpolation between the inputs.

column2: 創造週期。它可以在原始之前和之後重複多次通道。它還可以使單個循環從其結束到開始具有平滑過渡，因此它可以順利循環。
column3: Creates cycles. It can repeat the channels any number of times before and after the original. It can also make a single cycle have a smooth transition from its end to its beginning, so it loops smoothly.

column2: 將使用從DAT派生的值創建一組CHOP通道。
column3: Will create a set of CHOP channels with values derived from a DAT .

column2: 延遲輸入。可以饋入多個通道以分別延遲每個通道，並且每個通道可以具有單獨的延遲時間。
column3: Delays the input. Multiple channels can be fed in to delay each separately and each channels can have a separate delay time.

column2: 刪除來自其輸入的頻道。第一種方法使用文本字符串按名稱或數字範圍選擇通道。
column3: Removes channels coming from its input. A first method uses a text string to select channels by name or number ranges.

column2: 從DMX或Art-Net設備接收頻道。 DMX的通道值為0-255。注意：在TouchDesigner非商業用途中，DMX Out CHOP限制為32個通道。
column3: Receives channels from DMX or Art-Net devices.  Channel values for DMX are 0-255. NOTE: In TouchDesigner Non-commercial, the DMX Out CHOP is limited to 32 channels.

column2: 將頻道發送到DMX或Art-Net設備。 DMX的通道值為0-255。發送到DMX Out的第一個通道將對應第一個DMX地址（DMX通道）當您向DMX輸出添加通道時，您將按順序訪問下一個DMX通道。
column3: Sends channels to DMX or Art-Net devices.  Channel values for DMX are 0-255. The first channel you send into the DMX Out will correspond to the first DMX address (DMX channel) As you add channels to the DMX Out, you will access the next DMX channels in order.

column2: 輸出每個輸入樣本附近的最大幅度。它採用輸入的絕對值，並使用多個樣本的滑動窗口來查找每個樣本附近的最大幅度。
column3: Outputs the maximum amplitude in the vicinity of each sample of the input. It takes the absolute value of the input, and uses a sliding window of a number of samples to find the maximum amplitude near each sample.

column2: 最多5個通道輸入前5個通道中的X和Y（水平和垂直）位置值，以及接下來3個通道中的紅色，綠色和藍色值。
column3: Takes as input up to five channels interpreted as X and Y (horizontal and vertical) position values in the first 2 channels, and red, green and blue color values in the next 3 channels.

column2: 管理由MIDI鍵盤等設備觸發的重疊事件的誕生和生命。它可以看作是為MIDI鍵盤設計的簡單粒子系統。
column3: Manages the birth and life of overlapping events triggered by devices like a MIDI keyboard. It can be seen as a simple particle system designed for MIDI keyboards.

column2: 允許您使用數學表達式修改輸入通道。最多可提供六個表達式。每個輸入通道僅由一個表達式修改，表達式為多個通道循環。
column3: Allows you to modify input channels by using math expressions. Up to six expressions are available. Each input channel is modified by exactly one expression, and the expressions are looped for multiple channels.

column2: 僅設置CHOP的“擴展條件”，它確定在間隔之前或之後對CHOP進行採樣時獲得的值。
column3: Only sets the "extend conditions" of a CHOP, which determines what values you get when sampling the CHOP before or after its interval.

column2: 將一個通道轉換為多個通道，或將多個通道轉換為一個通道。它的第一個操作Fan Out需要一個通道並產生2個或更多通道。
column3: Converts one channel out to many channels, or converts many channels down to one. Its first operation, Fan Out, takes one channel and generates 2 or more channels.

column2: 存儲當前幀中的通道以在稍後的幀中使用，而不強制重新縮回一幀。
column3: Stores channels from the current frame to be used in a later frame, without forcing recooking back one frame.

column2: 讀入通道和音頻文件以供CHOP使用。可以從磁盤或Web中讀取該文件。
column3: Reads in channel and audio files for use by CHOPs. The file can be read in from disk or from the web.

column2: 將CHOP通道數據寫入.chan文件。數據可以每幀或間隔（由Interval參數設置）寫入日誌文件。
column3: Writes CHOP channel data out to .chan files. The data can be written out every frame or at intervals (set by the Interval parameter) into a log file.

column2: 平滑或銳化輸入通道。它通過組合每個樣本及其相鄰樣本的範圍來進行過濾，以設置該樣本的新值。
column3: Smooths or sharpens the input channels. It filters by combining each sample and a range of its neighbor samples to set the new value of that sample.

column2: 提供比Math CHOP更複雜的數學函數：三角函數，對數函數和指數函數，以及音頻分貝（dB） - 功率 - 幅度轉換。
column3: Provides more complicated math functions than found in the Math CHOP : trigonometic functions, logarithmic functions and exponential functions, and also audio decibels (dB)-power-amplitude conversions.

column2: 記錄第一個輸入的一小段，並使用手勢頁中指定的選項及時循環此段。
column3: Records a short segment of the first input and loops this segment in time with options as specified in the Gesture Page.

column2: 吃CPU週期（即CPU耗水 - 哼！）。這可以用來模擬較慢機器上的性能，或者人為地減慢合成器的幀速率。
column3: Eats up CPU cycles (ie it's a CPU hog - oink!). This can be used to simulate performance on slower machines, or to artifically slow down a synth's frame rate.

column2: 在第二個輸入上等待0到1步，此時它從第一個輸入讀取當前值（每個通道一個值）。
column3: Waits for a 0 to 1 step on its second input, at which time it reads the current values from the first input (one value per channel).

column2: 獲取連接到組件的其中一個輸入的通道。對於組件內的每個In CHOP，有一個輸入連接器添加到In CHOP的父組件中。
column3: Gets channels that are connected to one of the inputs of the component. For each In CHOP inside a component, there is one input connector added to the In CHOP's parent component.

column2: 為您提供有關節點的額外信息。所有節點都包含額外的內部信息，不同類型的節點（TOP，CHOP等）包含不同的信息子集。
column3: Gives you extra information about a node. All nodes contain extra inside information, and different types of nodes (TOPs, CHOPs, etc) contain different subsets of information.

column2: 將其多輸入視為關鍵幀並在它們之間進行插值。輸入通常是單幀CHOP通道，如Constant CHOP產生的通道。
column3: Treats its multiple-inputs as keyframes and interpolates between them. The inputs are usually single-frame CHOP channels like those produced by a Constant CHOP .

column2: 獲取所有輸入並追加一個CHOP。預計他們都有相同的渠道。
column3: Takes all its inputs and appends one CHOP after another. It is expected they all have the same channels.

column2: 從鍵盤接收ASCII輸入，並輸出指定鍵數的通道。它創建一個表示每個密鑰當前狀態的單幀通道。
column3: Receives ASCII input from the keyboard, and outputs channels for the number of keys specified. It creates a single-frame channel representing the current state of each key.

column2: 從Kinect和Linect2傳感器讀取位置和骨架跟踪數據。最多可以跟踪6個人的完整骨架（原始Kinect上有2個），並且還會跟踪攝像機視圖中另外4個人的中心位置。
column3: Reads positional and skeletal tracking data from the Kinect and Linect2 sensors.  Up to 6 people's full skeletons can be tracked (2 on the original Kinect), and the center position of an addition 4 people in the camera view is tracked as well.

column2: 為通道添加滯後和過衝。它還可以限制通道的速度和加速度。延遲減慢了輸入通道的快速變化。
column3: Adds lag and overshoot to channels. It can also limit the velocity and acceleration of channels. Lag slows down rapid changes in the input channels.

column2: 從Leap Motion控制器讀取手，手指，工具和手勢數據。它輸出手，手指和工具位置，旋轉和“跟踪”通道，指示當前是否正在檢測和更新這些值。
column3: Reads hand, finger, tool and gesture data from the Leap Motion controller. It outputs hand, finger and tool positions, rotations and 'tracking' channels that indicate if these values are currently being detected and updated.

column2: （低頻振盪器）以兩種方式實時產生波。它使用常見波形（如正弦波或脈衝波）選擇合成曲線，或重複準備的輸入曲線。
column3: (low frequency oscillator) generates waves in real-time in two ways. It synthesizes curves using a choice of common waveforms like Sine or Pulse, or it repeats a prepared incoming curve.

column2: 可以將輸入通道的值限制在最小值和最大值之間，並且可以在時間和/或值上量化輸入通道，使得值隨時間步進。
column3: Can limit the values of the input channels to be between a minimum and maximum, and can quantize the input channels in time and/or value such that the value steps over time.

column2: 首先將其所有輸入CHOP的通道轉換為二進制（0 =關，1 =開）通道，然後使用各種邏輯運算組合通道。
column3: First converts channels of all its input CHOPs into binary (0 = off, 1 = on) channels and then combines the channels using a variety of logic operations.

column2: 從查找表輸出值。第一個輸入（索引通道）是第二個輸入（查找表）的索引。
column3: Outputs values from a lookup table. The first input (the Index Channel) is an index into the second input (the Lookup Table).

column2: 讀取編碼為音頻信號的SMPTE時間碼數據。閱讀概述線性時間碼。首先使用CHOP中的音頻設備將音頻信號帶入CHOP。
column3: Reads SMPTE timecode data encoded into an audio signal.  Read the overview Linear Timecode . First bring the audio signal into CHOPs using an Audio Device In CHOP .

column2: 輸出“線性時間碼”，它是編碼為音頻信號的SMPTE時間碼數據。另請參見線性時間碼。
column3: Outputs "linear timecode" which is a SMPTE timecode data encoded into an audio signal.  See also Linear Timecode .

column2: 對通道執行算術運算。 CHOP的通道可以組合成一個通道，並且幾個CHOP可以組合成一個CHOP。
column3: Performs arithmetic operations on channels. The channels of a CHOP can be combined into one channel, and several CHOPs can be combined into one CHOP.

column2: 獲取多個輸入並將它們合併到輸出中。輸入的所有通道都出現在輸出中。
column3: Takes multiple inputs and merges them into the output. All the channels of the input appear in the output.

column2: 從MIDI設備和文件中讀取音符事件，控制器事件，程序變更事​​件，系統專用消息和定時事件。
column3: Reads Note events, Controller events, Program Change events, System Exclusive messages and Timing events from both MIDI devices and files.

column2: 首先參見MIDI In DAT。 MIDI In Map CHOP從MIDI設備映射器讀取指定的通道，準備從s1，s2等開始的滑塊通道。
column3: See first the MIDI In DAT . The MIDI In Map CHOP reads in specified channels from the MIDI Device Mapper which prepares slider channels starting from s1, s2, etc.

column2: 當MIDI輸入通道發生變化時，將MIDI事件發送到任何可用的MIDI設備。更靈活的是，Python MidioutCHOP Class可用於通過現有的MIDI Out CHOP將任何類型的MIDI事件發送到MIDI設備。
column3: Sends MIDI events to any available MIDI devices when its input channels change. More flexibly, the Python MidioutCHOP Class can be used to send any type of MIDI event to a MIDI device via an existing MIDI Out CHOP.

column2: 輸出鼠標設備的X和Y屏幕值，並監視三個鼠標按鈕的上/下狀態。
column3: Outputs X and Y screen values for the mouse device and monitors the up/down state of the three mouse buttons.

column2: NatNet In CHOP。
column3: The NatNet In CHOP.

column2: 產生一個永不重複的不規則波，其值大約在-1到+1的範圍內。它產生平滑的曲線和每個樣本隨機的噪聲。
column3: Makes an irregular wave that never repeats, with values approximately in the range -1 to +1. It generates both smooth curves and noise that is random each sample.

column2: 用作佔位符並且不會改變輸入的數據。它通常用於將通道導出到參數，這允許您試驗提供給Null的CHOP而無需從一個CHOP取消導出 - 從另一個出口。
column3: Is used as a place-holder and does not alter the data coming in. It is often used to Export channels to parameters, which allows you to experiment with the CHOPs that feed into the Null without having to un-export from one CHOP and re-export from another.

column2: 連接到Oculus Rift設備並輸出幾組有用的通道，可用於將Oculus Rift集成到項目中。
column3: Connects to an Oculus Rift device and outputs several useful sets of channels that can be used to integrate the Oculus Rift into projects.

column2: 以三種方式生成聲音。它重複常見的波形（正弦波，三角波），產生白噪聲（每個樣本的隨機數），或重複任何持續時間的準備輸入音頻片段。
column3: Generates sounds in three ways. It repeats common waveforms (sine, triangle), it generates white noise (a random number for each sample), or it repeats a prepared incoming audio clip of any duration.

column2: 將CHOP數據從組件內部發送到其他組件或CHOP。它將通道發送到組件的其中一個輸出。
column3: Sends CHOP data from inside a components to other components or CHOPs. It sends channels to one of the outputs of the component.

column2: 允許您從多個CHOP源獲取輸入，並使用最近更改的輸入通道來確定輸出。
column3: Lets you take inputs from several CHOP sources, and uses the most-recently changed input channels to determine the output.

column2: 從所有OP類型獲取參數值，包括自定義參數。 （在Build 46000或更高版本中。這將取代Fetch CHOP。
column3: Gets parameter values, including custom parameters, from all OP types. ( In Build 46000 or later . This replaces the Fetch CHOP.

column2: （參數均衡器）最多可為入射聲音應用3個參數濾波器。三個濾波器串聯，其中內部，第二個濾波器從第一個濾波器的輸出獲取其輸入，依此類推。
column3: (parametric equalizer ) applies up to 3 parametric filters to the incoming sound. The three filters are in series, where internally, the second filter takes its input from the output of the first filter, and so on.

column2: 在通道中生成一系列樣本。與Wave CHOP不同，它的目的是生成不參考時間（秒或幀）的樣本數組。
column3: Generates a sequence of samples in a channel. Unlike the Wave CHOP its purpose is generating arrays of samples that have no reference to time (seconds or frames).

column2: 輸出許多通道，如每秒幀數，描述TouchDesigner進程的當前狀態。
column3: Outputs many channels like frames-per-second, describing the current state of the TouchDesigner process.

column2: 允許用戶從自定義設備輸入CHOP。它實現為TCP / IP網絡連接。
column3: Allows users to input from custom devices into CHOPs. It is implemented as a TCP/IP network connection.

column2: 可用於使用網絡連接將數據從TouchDesigner傳輸到遠程計算機上運行的其他進程。
column3: Can be used to transmit data out of TouchDesigner to other processes running on a remote machine using a network connection.

column2: 以固定間隔在一個通道中生成脈衝。可以使用CHOP滑塊或圖形上的手柄編輯每個脈衝的幅度。
column3: Generates pulses in one channel at regular intervals. The amplitude of each pulse can be edited with the CHOP sliders or with handles on the graph.

column2: 從英特爾的RealSense相機接收位置數據。另請參見RealSense TOP適用於50000或更高版本。
column3: Receives positional data from Intel's RealSense camera. See also RealSense TOP Available in builds 50000 or later.

column2: 使通道進入第一個（位置）輸入，在內部轉換並記錄它們，並將存儲的通道輸出為CHOP輸出。
column3: Takes the channels coming in the first (Position) input, converts and records them internally, and outputs the stored channels as the CHOP output.

column2: 重命名頻道。輸入CHOP中的通道名稱使用From模式進行匹配，並在To模式中重命名為相應的名稱。
column3: Renames channels. Channels names from the input CHOP are matched using the From pattern, and are renamed to the corresponding name in the To pattern.

column2: 通過數字或字母模式重新排序第一個輸入CHOP的通道。通道模式指定新訂單，或數字序列指定新訂單。
column3: Re-orders the first input CHOP's channels by numeric or alphabetic patterns. Either a channel pattern specifies the new order, or a number sequence specifies the new order.

column2: 可用於非常快速地替換通道。如果Input2中存在匹配的通道，則Input1中的通道輸出將被Input2中的通道替換。
column3: Can be used to replace channels very quickly. The output of channels in Input1 will be replaced by channels found in Input2 if a matching channel exists in Input2.

column2: 將輸入通道重新採樣為新的採樣率和/或開始/結束間隔。在所有情況下，重新採樣整個輸入間隔以匹配輸出間隔。
column3: Resamples an input's channels to a new sample rate and/or start/end interval. In all cases, the entire input interval is resampled to match the output interval.

column2: 每次Script CHOP烹飪時運行一個腳本。默認情況下，腳本CHOP是使用包含三種Python方法的停靠DAT創建的：cook，onPulse和setupParameters。
column3: Runs a script each time the Script CHOP cooks. By default, the Script CHOP is created with a docked DAT that contains three Python methods: cook, onPulse, and setupParameters .

column2: 從任何CHOP網絡的其他CHOP中選擇和重命名頻道。您可以從控制面板小工具（如滑塊和按鈕）中選擇通道。
column3: Selects and renames channels from other CHOPs of any CHOP network. You can select the channels from control panel gadgets like sliders and buttons.

column2: 僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和Pro。 CHOP中的共享內存從共享內存段接收CHOP，該共享內存段在另一個進程或同一進程中連接到共享內存CHOP。
column3: Is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and Pro. The Shared Mem In CHOP receives CHOPs from a shared memory segment that is attached to a Shared Mem Out CHOP in another process or the same process.

column2: Shared Mem Out TOP僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和Pro。共享內存CHOP將CHOP發送到共享內存段，該共享內存段在另一個進程或同一進程中連接到CHOP中的共享內存。
column3: The Shared Mem Out TOP is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and Pro. The Shared Mem Out CHOP sends CHOPs to a shared memory segment that is attached to a Shared Mem In CHOP in another process or the same process.

column2: 時移CHOP，改變CHOP間隔的開始和結束。但是，頻道的內容保持不變。
column3: Time-shifts a CHOP, changing the start and end of the CHOP's interval. However, the contents of the channels remain the same.

column2: 在一組通道中重新組織樣本。將SOP接收的數據轉換為CHOP和TOP轉換為CHOP到僅包含一行或一列的通道非常有用。
column3: Reorganizes the samples in a set of channels. It is useful for transforming data received by the SOP to CHOP and TOP to CHOPs into channels containing only one row or column.

column2: 計算輸入通道的斜率（或數學說話中的“導數”）。如果輸入CHOP表示位置，則斜率可以解釋為速度。
column3: Calculates the slope (or "derivative" in math-speak) of the input channels. If the input CHOP represents position, the slope can be interpreted as speed.

column2: 按值或隨機重新排序輸入通道樣本。指定要排序的通道將根據新訂單重新排序所有剩餘通道樣本。
column3: Re-orders the inputs channels samples by value or by random. Specifying a channel to be sorted will reorder all remaining channels samples according to the new order.

column2: 計算並顯示輸入通道的頻譜。在默認的可視化模式中，CHOP設置為通過強調較高頻率級別和較低頻率範圍以更易理解的方式顯示頻譜。
column3: Calculates and displays the frequency spectrum of the input channels. In the default Visualization Mode the CHOP is set to display the spectrum in a more understandable way by emphasizing the higher frequency levels and the lower frequency ranges.

column2: 在一個時間範圍內將速度（每秒單位）轉換為距離（單位）。更一般地說，你給它一個速率（CHOP輸入）並輸出一個累積值。
column3: Converts speed (units per second) to distance (units) over a time range. More generally, you give it a rate (the CHOP input) and it outputs a cumulative value.

column2: 產生受輸入通道影響的振動，就像質量附著在彈簧上一樣。對於每個通道，它的作用就像是彈簧末端有質量，受實際位置（前一幀通道輸出）到所需位置（當前輸入通道）的距離影響幀）。
column3: Creates vibrations influenced by the input channels, as if a mass was attached to a spring. It acts as if, for every channel, there is a mass at the end of a spring, affected by a distance from the actual position (the output of the channel at the previous frame) to the desired position (the input channel at the current frame).

column2: 保留通道的形狀和採樣率，但將通道重新採樣為新的間隔。
column3: Preserves the shape of channels and the sampling rate, but resamples the channels into a new interval.

column2: 允許您通過CHOPnet控制通道流。它按索引選擇一個輸入CHOP並完全複製它。
column3: Allows you to control the flow of channels through a CHOPnet. It selects one of the input CHOPs by index and copies it exactly.

column2: 是用於運行定時進程的引擎。它輸出定時分數，計數器，脈沖和定時器狀態等通道，並在發生各種定時事件時調用python函數（回調）。
column3: Is an engine for running timed processes. It outputs channels such as timing fractions, counters, pulses and timer states, and it calls python functions (callbacks) when various timing events occur.

column2: 輸出特定組件的基於時間的CHOP通道。時間通道由時間組件定義，其路徑可以使用表達式timepath（）來確定。
column3: Outputs time-based CHOP channels for a specific component.  The time channels are defined by a Time Component whose Path can be determined using the expression timepath() .

column2: 輸出樣本的時間片。當TouchDesigner無法快速烹飪/繪製並且跟上每秒動畫的幀數時，它用於生成平滑的中間。
column3: Outputs a time slice of samples. It is used to generate smooth in-betweens when TouchDesigner cannot cook/draw fast enough and keep up with the animation's frames per second.

column2: 及時顯示其輸入通道的歷史記錄。從當前幀開始顯示時間窗口，該窗口的大小由窗口長度參數設置。
column3: Displays a history of its input channels back in time. A window of time is displayed from the current frame back in time, the size of this window is set by the Window Length parameter.

column2: 進行平移，旋轉和/或縮放通道，並使用CHOP中的變換參數對其進行變換。
column3: Takes translate, rotate, and/or scale channels and transforms them using the transform parameters in the CHOP.

column2: 為輸入通道中的所有觸發脈衝啟動音頻類型的攻擊/衰減/延音/釋放（ADSR）包絡。
column3: Starts an audio-style attack/decay/sustain/release (ADSR) envelope to all trigger pulses in the input channels.

column2: 縮短或延長輸入通道。可以保留或刪除部分間隔。如果通道被延長，通道的擴展條件將用於獲取新值。
column3: Shortens or lengthens the input's channels. A part of the interval can be preserved or removed. If the channels are being lengthened, the extend conditions of the channel will be used to get the new values.

column2: 使用第二個輸入（Warp曲線）中的一個變形通道對第一個輸入（Pre-Warp Channels）的通道進行時間扭曲。
column3: Time-warps the channels of the first input (the Pre-Warp Channels) using one warping channel in the second input (the Warp Curve).

column2: 製作各種形狀的重複波浪。它默認為10秒的1秒正弦波，總共600幀。
column3: Makes repeating waves with a variety of shapes. It is by default 10-seconds of 1-second sine waves, a total of 600 frames.

column2: 使用DirectSound或ASIO將音頻發送到任何連接的音頻輸出設備。音頻通道可以路由到任何揚聲器位置。
column3: Sends audio to any of the attached audio output devices using DirectSound or ASIO. The audio channels can be routed to any speaker location.

column2: 從磁盤上的文件或http：//地址讀取音頻。支持文件類型.mp3，.aif，.aiff，.au和.wav文件。
column3: Reads audio from files on disk or at http:// addresses. File types .mp3, .aif, .aiff, .au, and .wav files are supported.

column2: 播放用TOP中的電影文件播放的電影文件的音頻。通過電影文件在TOP參數中將音頻電影TOP指向TOP中的電影文件。
column3: Plays the audio of a movie file that is played back with a Movie File In TOP . Make the Audio Movie TOP point to a Movie File In TOP via the Movie File In TOP parameter.

column2: 使用DirectSound通過任何連接的音頻輸出設備播放聲音文件。它支持.aif ,.
column3: Plays back a sound file through any attached audio output device using DirectSound. It supports .aif, .

column2: 是僅限TouchDesigner Pro的操作員。音頻SDI在CHOP中可以從任何SDI IN TOP中捕獲音頻。
column3: Is a TouchDesigner Pro only operator. The Audio SDI In CHOP can capture the audio from any SDI In TOP .

column2: 是僅限TouchDesigner Pro的操作員。看到。
column3: Is a TouchDesigner Pro only operator. See.

column2: 是僅限TouchDesigner Pro的操作員。它可以用作動畫系統，在不同的動畫片段之間進行融合，保持旋轉，改變目標位置等。
column3: Is a TouchDesigner Pro only operator.  It can be used as an animation system that blends between different animation clips, preserving rotation, changing target positions etc.

column2: 允許您通過使用C ++編寫自己的.dll來創建自定義CHOP運算符。注意：CPlusPlus CHOP僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和TouchDesigner Pro。
column3: Allows you to make custom CHOP operators by writing your own .dll using C++. Note : The CPlusPlus CHOP is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and TouchDesigner Pro .

column2: 是使用Handle COMP驅動Inverse Kinematic解決方案的“引擎”。 Handle CHOP的作用是為骨骼生成旋轉值，使其附加的手柄盡可能靠近各自的目標。
column3: Is the "engine" which drives Inverse Kinematic solutions using the Handle COMP . The role of the Handle CHOP is to generate rotation values for the bones which will bring their attached handles as close to their respective targets as possible.

column2: 使用曲線對象計算骨骼對象的反向運動學模擬。反向曲線CHOP將拉伸和定位一組骨骼，以跟隨另一組對象（指南）定義的曲線。
column3: Calculates an inverse kinematics simulation for bone objects using a curve object. The Inverse Curve CHOP will stretch and position a set of bones to follow a curve defined by another set of objects (guide).

column2: 計算Bone對象的反向運動學模擬。
column3: Calculates an inverse kinematics simulation for Bone objects .

column2: 在任何遊戲控制器（操縱桿，遊戲控制器，驅動輪等）上輸出所有6個可能軸的值。
column3: Outputs values for all 6 possible axes on any game controller (joysticks, game controllers, driving wheels, etc.

column2: 使用動畫COMP中的通道和鍵數據，以可選擇的採樣率（每秒幀數）創建樣本通道。
column3: Uses channel and keys data in an Animation COMP and creates channels of samples at a selectable sample rate (frames per second).

column2: 強制使用傳入的CHOP通道從TouchDesigner驅動鼠標位置和按鈕狀態。
column3: Forces the mouse position and button status to be driven from TouchDesigner using the incoming CHOP channels.

column2: 比較兩個對象並輸出包含其原始或相對位置和方向的通道。
column3: Compares two objects and outputs channels containing their raw or relative positions and orientations.

column2: 用於接受開放聲音控制消息。 OSC In可用於接受來自符合Open Sound Control規範的第三方應用程序的消息（http：// www。
column3: Is used to accept Open Sound Control Messages. OSC In can be used to accept messages from either a 3rd party application which adheres to the Open Sound Control specification ( http://www.

column2: 將所有輸入通道發送到指定的網絡地址和端口。每個通道名稱和相關數據一起傳輸到指定位置。
column3: Sends all input channels to a specified network address and port. Each channel name and associated data is transmitted together to the specified location.

column2: 從Panel Components讀取面板值到CHOP通道。也可以使用panel（）表達式訪問面板值。
column3: Reads Panel Values from Panel Components into CHOP channels. Panel values can also be accessed by using the panel() expression.

column2: 對渲染進行採樣（從Render TOP或Render Pass TOP）並從該特定拾取位置處的幾何體返回3D信息。
column3: Samples a rendering (from a Render TOP or a Render Pass TOP ) and returns 3D information from the geometry at that particular pick location.

column2: 將SOP或TOP轉換為示波器或激光友好控制波。輸出通常在可聽範圍內，可通過音頻設備輸出CHOP直接聽到，或用於驅動示波器的X和Y偏轉器輸入，重新創建圖像。
column3: Converts a SOP or TOP to oscilloscope or laser friendly control waves.  The output is usually in the audible range and can be heard directly via an Audio Device Out CHOP, or used to drive the X and Y deflector inputs of an oscilloscope, recreating the imagery.

column2: 用於通過外部端口進行串行通信，使用R​​S-232協議。這些端口通常是9針連接器，或新機器上的USB端口。
column3: Is used for serial communication through an external port, using the RS-232 protocol. These ports are usually a 9 pin connector, or a USB port on new machines.

column2: 使用幾何對象選擇將從中創建通道的SOP。通道是根據SOP的點屬性創建的，例如點位置的X，Y和Z.
column3: Uses a geometry object to choose a SOP from which the channels will be created. The channels are created from the point attributes of a SOP, such as the X, Y and Z of the point position.

column2: 並且同步輸出CHOP用於在兩個或更多個TouchDesigner進程中保持時間線在彼此的單個幀內。
column3: And Sync Out CHOP are used to keep timelines in two or more TouchDesigner processes within a single frame of each other.

column2: CHOP中的同步和同步輸出CHOP用於在兩個或更多個TouchDesigner進程內保持時間線在彼此的單個幀內。
column3: The Sync In CHOP and Sync Out CHOP are used to keep timelines in two or more TouchDesigner processes within a single frame of each other.

column2: 獲取Wacom數位板X和Y值，還可獲得筆尖壓力，X傾斜和Y傾斜以及各種筆按鈕。
column3: Gets the Wacom tablet X and Y values, and also gets pen tip pressure, X tilt and Y tilt, and the various pen buttons.

column2: 將TOP圖像中的像素轉換為CHOP通道。它在圖像和每個像素顏色元素（RGBA）中為每個掃描線（行）生成一個CHOP通道。
column3: Converts pixels in a TOP image to CHOP channels. It generates one CHOP channel per scanline (row) in the image and per pixel color element (RGBA).

column2: 可用於通過CHOP在兩個TouchDesigner進程之間創建高速連接。數據通過TCP / IP發送。
column3: Can be used to create a high speed connection between two TouchDesigner processes via CHOPs. Data is sent over TCP/IP.

column2: 可用於在兩個TouchDesigner進程之間創建高速連接。數據通過TCP / IP發送。
column3: Can be used to create high speed connection between two TouchDesigner processes. Data is sent over TCP/IP.

column2: 使用Oculus Audio SDK獲取單聲道聲道，並為該聲音創建空間化立體聲對或聲道。
column3: Uses the Oculus Audio SDK to take a mono sound channel and create a spatialized stereo pair or channels for that sound.

column2: 環境光組件控制給定場景中環境光的顏色和強度。
column3: The Ambient Light Component controls the color and intensity of the environmental light in a given scene.

column2: 基礎組件沒有面板參數，也沒有3D對象參數。您可以將它用於沒有與之關聯的面板的組件，也可以用於任何3D，例如將RGB通道轉換為HSV通道的組件。
column3: The Base Component has no panel parameters and no 3D object parameters. You would use it for a component that has no panel associated with it, nor any 3D, such as component that converted RGB channels to HSV channels.

column2: 混合組件允許各種效果，例如混合輸入，動畫組件的父級，排序，部分變換繼承，三點方向和其他效果。
column3: The Blend Component allows various effects such as blended inputs, animating the parents of Components, sequencing, partial transformation inheritance, three-point orientation, and other effects.

column2: Bone Component是所有Character Tools的基礎。它是具有幾何組件的大多數屬性的組件。
column3: The Bone Component is the foundation of all of the Character Tools . It is a Component with most of the properties of a Geometry Component .

column2: Camera Component是一個3D物體，其作用類似於真實世界的相機。您可以通過它查看場景並從它們的角度進行渲染。
column3: The Camera Component is a 3D object that acts like real-world cameras. You view your scene through it and render from their point of view.

column2: 相機混合組件通過將多個組件混合在一起來實現各種效果。它為您提供了一些設置父子關係的額外靈活性。
column3: The Camera Blend Component allows various effects by blending multiple Components together. It gives you some extra flexibility in setting up parent-child relationships.

column2: Geometry Component是一個3D表面，您可以在TouchDesigner中使用Render TOP查看和渲染。燈光，相機和其他組件會影響場景，但不是可見的曲面。
column3: The Geometry Component is a 3D surface that you see and render in TouchDesigner with a Render TOP . Lights, cameras and other Components affect the scene, but are not visible surfaces.

column2: Handle Component是一個新的IK工具，用於操縱骨骼組。雖然之前的IK工具僅允許每個骨鏈使用一個末端效應器，但這種新方法允許每個骨骼使用多個末端效應器。
column3: The Handle Component is a new IK tool designed for manipulating groups of bones. Whereas the previous IK tools only allowed for a single end-affector per bone chain, this new method allows for several end-affectors per bone.

column2: 燈光組件是將光投射到3D場景中的對象。使用燈光參數，您可以控制燈光照亮的幾何體的顏色，亮度和氛圍。
column3: The Light Components are objects which cast light into a 3D scene. With the light parameters you can control the color, brightness, and atmosphere of geometry lit by the light.

column2: Null組件充當場景中的佔位符。它可用於轉換（平移，旋轉，縮放）附加到其上的組件。
column3: The Null Component serves as a place-holder in a scene. It can be used to transform (translate, rotate, scale) Components attached to it.

column2: 僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和Pro。 COMP中的Shared Mem將從共享內存塊中讀取轉換數據。
column3: Is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and Pro. The Shared Mem In COMP will read transform data from a shared memory block.

column2: TOP中的Shared Mem僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和Pro。 Shared Mem Out COMP將轉換數據寫入共享內存塊。
column3: The Shared Mem In TOP is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and Pro. The Shared Mem Out COMP will write transform data to a shared memory block.

column2: 動畫組件是用於創建關鍵幀動畫通道的特殊組件。該組件包含一個預定義的網絡，利用Keyframe CHOP和許多表DAT來定義動畫CHOP通道。
column3: The Animation Component is a special component used for creating keyframe animation channels. The component contains a pre-defined network utilizing a Keyframe CHOP and a number of Table DATs to define the animated CHOP channels.

column2: 按鈕組件用於面板中以提供交互式開/關按鈕，包括切換按鈕，瞬時按鈕和單選按鈕組或專用按鈕。
column3: The Button Component is used in panels to provide interactive on/off buttons, including toggle buttons, momentary buttons, and sets of radio buttons or exclusive buttons.

column2: Container Component將任意數量的按鈕，滑塊，字段，容器和其他Panel Components組合在一起以構建界面。
column3: The Container Component groups together any number of button, slider, field, container and other Panel Components to build an interface.

column2: Field Component允許您輸入文本字符串並呈現使用Text TOP生成的文本。在內部，它包含一個Text TOP，它指向包含要呈現的文本的DAT的一個單元格。
column3: The Field Component lets you enter text strings and renders text generated with the Text TOP . Internally it contains a Text TOP which points to one cell of a DAT that contains the text to render.

column2: List Component允許您通過List COMPs初始化和回調函數創建可高度自定義的大型列表。
column3: The List Component lets you create large lists that are highly customizable via the List COMPs initialization and callback functions.

column2: OP Viewer Component允許任何操作員查看器（CHOP Viewer，SOP Viewer等）成為具有完全交互性的面板的一部分。
column3: The OP Viewer Component allows any operator viewer (CHOP Viewer, SOP Viewer etc) to be part of a panel with full interactivity.

column2: Replicator組件為表的每一行創建一個節點，創建節點（“replicants”）並在表更改時刪除它們。
column3: The Replicator Component creates a node for every row of a table, creating nodes (" replicants ") and deleting them as the table changes.

column2: 選擇組件從任何其他位置選擇面板組件。這允許面板出現在多個其他面板中。
column3: The Select Component selects a Panel Component from any other location. This allows a panel to appear in multiple other panels.

column2: 滑塊組件允許您在X，Y和XY中構建滑塊，並從放置在Slider組件中的Panel CHOP輸出1或2個通道。
column3: The Slider Component lets you build sliders in X, Y and XY, and outputs 1 or 2 channels from a Panel CHOP placed in the Slider component.

column2: 表組件創建用戶界面小工具網格。這些面板以網格格式佈局，其中每個單元的內容由DAT表定義。
column3: The Table Component creates a grid of user interface gadgets.  These panels are laid out in a grid format where the contents of each cell are defined by DAT tables.

column2: 時間組件允許每個組件具有自己的時間線（時鐘）。時間組件包含一個操作員網絡，可以驅動時間軸，在動畫COMP中驅動動畫，或用於驅動任何自定義的基於時間的系統。
column3: The Time Component allows each component to have its own timeline (clock). The Time Component contains a network of operators that can drive a Timeline, drive animations in Animation COMPs, or be used to drive any custom time-based system.

column2: Window Component允許您創建和維護一個單獨的浮動窗口，顯示任何Panel或任何其他Node Viewer的內容。
column3: The Window Component allows you to create and maintain a separate floating window displaying the contents of any Panel or any other Node Viewer .

column2: 通過添加像素值將輸入圖像合成在一起。輸出= Input1 + Input2。如果總和超過1，它會箝制顏色通道。
column3: Composites the input images together by adding the pixel values. Output = Input1 + Input2. It clamps a color channel if the sum exceeds 1.

column2: 拍攝任何圖像並確定其各種特徵，例如平均像素顏色或具有最大亮度的像素。
column3: Takes any image and determines various characteristics of it, such as the average pixel color, or the pixel with the maximum luminance.

column2: 使用OpenCV的源代碼實現，其中大部分都移植到GPU以獲得更快的性能。
column3: Is implemented using source code from OpenCV, much of which was ported to the GPU for faster performance.

column2: 使用各種內核過濾器和半徑模糊圖像。它可以進行多次通過模糊，並且可以進行僅水平或僅垂直模糊。
column3: Blurs the image with various kernel filters and radii. It can do multi-pass blurs and can do horizontal-only or vertical-only blurs.

column2: 將一系列圖像存儲到GPU內存中。圖形卡可以比主存儲器中的圖像緩存快速讀取這些緩存的圖像，或者從磁盤讀取圖像。
column3: Stores a sequence of images into GPU memory. These cached images can be read by the graphics card much faster than an image cache in main memory or reading images off disk.

column2: 根據索引參數從Cache TOP中獲取圖像。這樣可以直接隨機訪問存儲在Cache TOP中的任何圖像。
column3: Grabs an image from a Cache TOP based on the index parameter. This gives direct, random access to any image stored in a Cache TOP.

column2: 允許將輸入RGBA通道混合到輸出的任何其他顏色通道。例如，輸入藍色通道中的像素可以添加到輸出的紅色通道中，加上或減去紅色參數藍色列中的數量。
column3: Allows mixing of the input RGBA channels to any other color channel of the output. For example, the pixels in the blue channel of the input can be added to the output's red channel, added or subtracted by the amount in Red parameter's blue column.

column2: 將CHOP通道置於TOP圖像中。通過將TOP的像素格式設置為32位浮點數，CHOP的完整32位浮點數轉換為32位浮點像素值。
column3: Puts CHOP channels into a TOP image. The full 32-bit floating point numbers of a CHOP are converted to 32-bit floating point pixel values by setting the TOP's Pixel Format to 32-bit floats.

column2: 使用“色相”，“飽和度”和“值”設置從圖像中拉出關鍵遮罩。如果像素落在所有三個設置的最小和最大參數之間，則它將包含在密鑰中。
column3: Pulls a key matte from the image using Hue, Saturation, and Value settings. If a pixel falls between the Min and Max parameters for all three settings, then it is included in the key.

column2: 可用於生成圓，橢圓和N邊多邊形。形狀可以定制不同的尺寸，旋轉和定位。
column3: Can be used to generate circles, ellipses and N-sided polygons. The shapes can be customized with different sizes, rotation and positioning.

column2: 是一個多輸入TOP，它將為每個輸入執行複合操作。使用Composite參數頁面上的Operation參數選擇複合操作。
column3: Is a multi-input TOP that will perform a composite operation for each input. Select the composite operation using the Operation parameter on the Composite parameter page.

column2: 分別設置紅色，綠色，藍色和alpha（r，g，b和a）通道。它通常用於創建純色TOP圖像。
column3: Sets the red, green, blue, and alpha (r, g, b, and a) channels individually. It is commonly used to create a solid color TOP image.

column2: 使用包含數字係數的DAT表。對於每個像素，它通過將值乘以表中的相應係數，將其RGBA值與其相鄰像素的RGBA值組合，將結果相加。
column3: Uses a DAT table containing numeric coefficients.  For each pixel, it combines its RGBA values and it's neighboring pixels' RGBA values by multiplying the values by the corresponding coefficients in the table, adding the results together.

column2: 可以執行兩個操作。 “提取”頁面允許您通過移動4個點來指定要使用的圖像的子部分。
column3: Can perform two operations. The Extract page lets you specify a sub-section of the image to use by moving 4 points.

column2: 通過定義圖像左，右，底部和頂部邊緣的位置來裁剪圖像。圖像的裁剪部分被丟棄，從而降低了圖像的分辨率。
column3: Crops an image by defining the position of the left, right, bottom, and top edges of the image. The cropped part of the image is discarded, thus reducing the resolution of the image.

column2: 基於Cross參數的值在兩個輸入圖像之間進行混合（在下面稱為Cross_value）。
column3: Blends between the two input images based on the value of the Cross parameter (refered to as Cross_value below).

column2: 以立方體貼圖內部紋理格式構建紋理貼圖。它接受垂直交叉圖像，或立方體每側1個輸入。
column3: Builds a texture map in the Cube Map internal texture format. It accepts a vertical cross image, or 1 input per side of the cube.

column2: 在其兩個輸入圖像上執行差異合成。
column3: Performs a difference composite on its two input images.

column2: 將導致一個圖像被另一個圖像扭曲。 （Uo，Vo）的輸出圖像的像素通過使用第二輸入圖像（位移圖像）從源圖像的不同像素（Ui，Vi）獲得其RGBA值。
column3: Will cause one image to be warped by another image. A pixel of the output image at (Uo,Vo) gets its RGBA value from a different pixel (Ui, Vi) of the Source Image by using the second input image (the Displace Image).

column2: 將其他應用程序的DirectX紋理帶入TouchDesigner。此功能僅適用於Windows 7或更高版本，可通過DirectX共享資源功能訪問。
column3: Brings DirectX textures from other applications into TouchDesigner.  This feature is only available on Windows 7 or greater, accessed through the DirectX Sharing Resources feature.

column2: 創建DirectX應用程序可以訪問的紋理，或者使用DirectX In TOP創建TouchDesigner的任何實例。
column3: Creates textures that a DirectX application can access, or any instance of TouchDesigner with a DirectX In TOP.

column2: 查找圖像中的邊緣並突出顯示它們。對於每個像素，它查看相鄰像素處的值，並且差異大於閾值時，輸出的值更高。
column3: Finds edges in an image and highlights them. For each pixel, it looks at the values at neighboring pixels, and where differences are greater than a threshold, the output's value is higher.

column2: 創建圖像壓印在薄金屬片中的效果。圖像中的邊緣將顯示為凸起。
column3: Creates the effect that an image is embossed in a thin sheet of metal. Edges in the image will appear raised.

column2: 可用於在TOP中創建反饋效果。每當反饋被反饋時（通過設置旁路反饋參數= 1），反饋TOP的輸入圖像將被傳遞。
column3: Can be used to create feedback effects in TOPs. The Feedback TOP's input image will be passed through whenever Feedback is bypassed (by setting the Bypass Feedback parameter = 1).

column2: 使用Fit參數菜單中指定的方法將其輸入重新調整為在Common Page上設置的分辨率。
column3: Re-sizes its input to the resolution set on the Common Page using the method specified in the Fit parameter menu.

column2: 將在X和/或Y中翻轉圖像。它還提供翻轉選項，將每行像素轉換為一列。
column3: Will Flip an image in X and/or Y. It also offers a Flop option to turn each row of pixels into a column.

column2: 將GLSL著色器渲染為TOP圖像。使用Info DAT檢查著色器中的編譯錯誤。
column3: Renders a GLSL shader into a TOP image. Use the Info DAT to check for compile errors in your shaders.

column2: 將GLSL著色器渲染為TOP圖像。它的參數和功能與之相同。
column3: Renders a GLSL shader into a TOP image. Its parameters and functionality are identical to the.

column2: 使用色調，飽和度和值控制調整顏色值。如果更改Hue Offset，Saturation Multiplier和Value Multiplier而不更改任何其他參數，則將修改圖像中所有像素的顏色。
column3: Adjust color values using hue, saturation, and value controls. If you change the Hue Offset, Saturation Multiplier and Value Multiplier without changing any of the other parameters then you will modify the color of all pixels in the image.

column2: 將圖像從HSV顏色通道轉換為RGB顏色通道。
column3: Converts an image from HSV color channels to RGB color channels.

column2: 捕獲Kinect深度相機或RGB彩色相機的視頻。注意：此TOP適用於Kinect for Windows硬件並支持Kinect2。
column3: Captures video from the Kinect depth camera or RGB color camera. NOTE: This TOP works with the Kinect for Windows hardware and supports the Kinect2.

column2: 用於在Component中創建TOP輸入。組件輸入以字母數字的形式定位在組件的左側。
column3: Is used to create a TOP input in a Component. Component inputs are positioned alphanumerically on the left side of the Component.

column2: 將Input1'置於'Input2內。 Input2的alpha用於確定Input1圖像的哪些部分可見。
column3: Places Input1 'inside' Input2. The alpha of Input2 is used to determine what parts of the Input1 image are visible.

column2: 調整圖像對比度，亮度，伽瑪，黑電平，顏色範圍，量化，不透明度等。
column3: Adjusts image contrast, brightness, gamma, black level, color range, quantization, opacity and more.

column2: 從Leap Motion Controller的攝像頭獲取圖像。要啟用此功能，必須在Leap Motion控制面板中打開“允許圖像”選項。
column3: Gets the image from the Leap Motion Controller's cameras.  To enable this feature the option Allow Images must be turned on in the Leap Motion Control Panel.

column2: 將連接到其第一個輸入的TOP圖像中的顏色值替換為從第二個輸入或使用CHOP參數創建的查找表創建的查找表派生的值。
column3: Replaces color values in the TOP image connected to its first input with values derived from a lookup table created from its second intput or a lookup table created using the CHOP parameter.

column2: 基於每個像素模糊圖像，取決於其第二輸入的亮度或灰度值。使用白色和黑色濾鏡尺寸的單獨參數模糊圖像，這些參數對應於第二輸入的白色和黑色亮度值。
column3: Blurs image on a per-pixel basis depending on the luminance or greyscale value of its second input. The image is blurred with separate parameters for white and black filter sizes, which correspond to the white and black luminance values of the second input.

column2: 調整圖像亮度，伽瑪，黑電平，量化，不透明度等。它具有與Level TOP類似的參數，但是當您使用Gamma和Black Level時，它可以更準確地保持色調和飽和度。
column3: Adjusts image brightness, gamma, black level, quantization, opacity and more. It has similar parameters to the Level TOP, but it maintains the hue and saturation more accurately when you use Gamma and Black Level.

column2: 對輸入圖像的像素執行特定的數學運算。
column3: Performs specific mathematical operations on the pixels of the input image.

column2: 使用input3的alpha通道作為遮罩，在input2上複合輸入1。 input3的alpha通道中的白色（一個）像素將在input2上繪製input1，黑色（或零）將使input1透明，將input2圖像留在該像素處。
column3: Composites input1 over input2 using the alpha channel of input3 as a matte. White (one) pixels in input3's alpha channel will draw input1 over input2, black (or zero) will make input1 transparent, leaving the input2 image at that pixel.

column2: 將圖像更改為灰度顏色。您可以選擇多種不同的方法，使用RGB和Alpha菜單將圖像轉換為灰度。
column3: Changes an image to greyscale colors. You can choose from a number of different methods to convert the image to greyscale using the RGB and Alpha menus.

column2: 將電影，靜止圖像或一系列靜止圖像加載到TOP中。它將以.jpg，.gif ,.讀取圖像。
column3: Loads movies, still images, or a sequence of still images into TOPs. It will read images in .jpg, .gif, .

column2: 對Input1和Input2執行乘法運算。
column3: Performs a multiply operation on Input1 and Input2.

column2: 產生各種噪聲模式，包括稀疏，鱷魚和隨機。它目前在CPU上運行並將其圖像傳遞給GPU。
column3: Generates a variety of noise patterns including sparse, alligator and random. It currently runs on the CPU and passes its images to the GPU.

column2: 獲取輸入圖像並通過查找圖像中的邊緣來創建法線貼圖。然後可以將其用於凹凸貼圖（參見Phong MAT）。
column3: Takes an input image and creates a normal map by finding edges in the image. This can then be used for bump mapping (See Phong MAT ).

column2: 對圖像沒有影響。它是連接到其輸入的TOP的實例。 Null TOP通常在引用TOP網絡時使用，允許將新TOP添加到網絡（上游），而無需更新引用。
column3: Has no effect on the image. It is an instance of the TOP connected to its input. The Null TOP is often used when making reference to a TOP network, allowing new TOPs to be added to the network (upstream) without the need to update the reference.

column2: 用於在Component中創建TOP輸出。組件輸出以字母數字的形式定位在組件的右側。
column3: Is used to create a TOP output in a Component. Component outputs are positioned alphanumerically on the right side of the Component.

column2: 將Input1'放在'Input2之外。只要Input2的alpha <1，Input1在輸出中可見。這是與Inside TOP相反的操作。
column3: Places Input1 'outside' Input2. Input1 is visible in the output wherever Input2's alpha is <1. This is the opposite operation to the Inside TOP.

column2: 將Input1'放在'Input2上。 Input1的alpha用於確定Input2圖像的哪些部分在結果中可見。
column3: Places Input1 'over' Input2. The alpha of Input1 is used to determine what parts of the Input2 image are visible in the result.

column2: 注意：僅在構建48000或更高版本中。
column3: Note: Only in builds 48000 or later.

column2: 可以將Photoshop CS6的輸出流式傳輸到TouchDesigner中。 Photoshop可以與TouchDesigner在同一台計算機上運行，也可以在網絡上的任何其他計算機上運行。
column3: Can stream the output from Photoshop CS6 into TouchDesigner.  Photoshop can be running on the same computer as TouchDesigner or any other computer on the network.

column2: 拍攝使用渲染TOP創建的立方體貼圖並將其轉換為適合圓頂的魚眼投影，以及“equirectangular”投影，其中u-v是緯度 - 經度，適用於球體。
column3: Takes a Cube Map created with a Render TOP and converts that to a fisheye projection suitable for domes, and a "equirectangular" projection, where u-v is latitude-longitude, suitable for spheres.

column2: 允許您以交互方式創建垂直，水平，徑向和圓形斜坡。使用漸變條和顏色選擇器，您可以根據需要為漸變添加任意數量的顏色選項卡，每個選項卡都有自己的顏色和alpha值。
column3: Allows you to interactively create vertical, horizontal, radial, and circular ramps. Using the ramp bar and the color picker, you can add as many color tabs to the ramp as you like, each with its own color and alpha values.

column2: 連接到RealSense設備並從中輸出顏色，深度和IR數據。另請參見RealSense CHOP。
column3: Connects to RealSense devices and outputs color, depth and IR data from it. See also RealSense CHOP.

column2: 使用第二個輸入扭曲第一個輸入。對於輸出的每個像素，它使用第二個輸入的紅色通道和綠色通道來選擇從第一個輸入中選擇哪個像素。
column3: Uses the second input to warp the first input. For every pixel of the output, it uses the red channel and green channel of the second input to choose which pixel to pick from the first input.

column2: 可用於生成帶圓角的矩形。形狀可以定制不同的尺寸，旋轉和定位。
column3: Can be used to generate Rectangles with rounded corners. The shapes can be customized with different sizes, rotation and positioning.

column2: 是一個多輸入TOP，可讓您選擇R，G，B和A輸出的任何輸入通道。它還提供了向任何輸出通道輸出一個，零或輸入亮度的選項。
column3: Is a multi-input TOP which lets you choose any of the input channels for the R, G, B, and A output. It also gives the option of outputting one, zero or the input luminance to any of the output channels.

column2: 更改TOP圖像的分辨率。這也可以在大多數其他TOP的公共頁面上完成。
column3: Changes the resolution of the TOP image. This can also be done on the Common page of most other TOPs.

column2: RGV到HSV TOP將圖像從RGB轉換為HSV色彩空間。 R通道變為Hue，G通道變為飽和，B通道變為Value。
column3: The RGV to HSV TOP converts the image from RGB to HSV colorspace. The R channel becomes Hue, the G channel becomes Saturation, and the B channel becomes Value.

column2: 使用紅色，綠色和藍色通道設置從圖像中拉出一個鍵。如果像素落在所有三個設置的最小和最大參數之間，則它將包含在密鑰中。
column3: Pulls a key from the image using Red, Green, and Blue channel settings. If a pixel falls between the Min and Max parameters for all three settings, then it is included in the key.

column2: 根據屏蔽層像素的亮度，使基礎圖層變亮。如果屏蔽像素為黑色，則看起來完全透明。
column3: Brightens the underlying layers depending on how bright the screened layer's pixels are. If the screened pixel is black, it will look completely transparent.

column2: 將主屏幕輸出變為TOP圖像。它可以在您工作時實時捕獲。
column3: Turns the main screen output into a TOP image. It can be captured in real-time while you work.

column2: 是僅限TouchDesigner Pro的操作員。 SDI In TOP使用NVIDIA的SDI採集卡將視頻幀直接捕獲到GPU內存中。
column3: Is a TouchDesigner Pro only operator. The SDI In TOP uses NVIDIA's SDI Capture Card to capture video frames directly into GPU memory.

column2: SDI In TOP是僅限TouchDesigner Pro的操作員。 SDI Select TOP用於從Nvidia SDI Capture卡上的SDI In TOP中的2-4個輸入中選擇視頻。
column3: The SDI In TOP is a TouchDesigner Pro only operator. The SDI Select TOP is used to select video from the 2-4 inputs in the SDI In TOP on the Nvidia SDI Capture card.

column2: 允許您從TouchDesigner中的任何其他位置引用TOP。為了節省圖形內存，Select TOP創建TOP引用的實例。
column3: Allows you to reference a TOP from any other location in TouchDesigner. To save graphics memory, the Select TOP creates an instance of the TOP references.

column2: 僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和Pro。 TOP中的Shared Mem將從共享內存塊中讀取圖像數據。
column3: Is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and Pro. The Shared Mem In TOP will read image data from a shared memory block.

column2: 僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和Pro。 Shared Mem Out TOP將圖像數據寫入共享內存塊，供其他TouchDesigner進程或其他第三方應用程序使用。
column3: Is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and Pro. The Shared Mem Out TOP will write image data out to a shared memory block for use by other TouchDesigner processes or other 3rd party applications.

column2: 生成表示其值與其相鄰像素值之間差異的像素。
column3: Generates pixels that represent the difference between its value and its neighbouring pixels' values.

column2: 通過減去像素值將輸入圖像合成在一起。輸出=輸入1  - 輸入2。低於0的像素值被扼殺為0。
column3: Composites the input images together by subtracting the pixel values. Output = Input1 - Input2. The pixel values below 0 are clammped to 0.

column2: 創建RTSP客戶端以通過網絡接收視頻和音頻。連接到RTSP服務器的URL格式為：rtsp：// <ipaddress>：<port> / <streamName> e。
column3: Creates an RTSP client to receive video and audio across the network.  The URL to connect to the RTSP server is in the form: rtsp://<ipaddress>:<port>/<streamName> e.

column2: 將與支持Spout框架的其他應用程序共享其輸入紋理。您可以在http：// spout下載Spout安裝包。
column3: Will share its input texture with other applications that support the Spout framework . You can download a Spout setup package at http://spout.

column2: 將通過支持Spout框架的其他應用程序的共享內存獲取其紋理圖像。
column3: Will obtain its texture image via shared memory from other applications that support the Spout framework .

column2: 注 - 自DK1以來，Oculus SDK已經發生了很大的變化。最初的DK1使用Oculus Rift TOP進行桶形失真。
column3: Note - The Oculus SDK has changed a lot over since the DK1. The original DK1 used the Oculus Rift TOP to do the barrel distortion.

column2: 允許您加載從運行可擴展顯示校準軟件檢索到的校準數據。有關可伸縮顯示器SDK的TouchDesigners集成的完整指南，請參閱如何使用可擴展顯示器校準投影儀。
column3: Lets you load calibration data retrieved from running the Scalable Display Calibration Software . Please refer to How-to calibrate your projector with Scalable Displays for a complete guide on TouchDesigners integration of the Scalable Displays SDK.

column2: 是一個多輸入操作符，它允許您使用Input參數切換傳遞的輸入。
column3: Is a multi-input operator which lets you switch which input is passed through using the Input parameter.

column2: 創建3D紋理貼圖。它將一系列圖像保存在一個像素陣列中。此TOP可與Time Machine TOP以及材料一起使用。
column3: Creates a 3D texture map. It saves a series of images in one array of pixels. This TOP can be used with Time Machine TOP, as well as materials.

column2: 對於低於閾值的像素，創建像素值設置為0的遮罩，對於大於或等於閾值的像素，創建1。
column3: Creates a matte with pixel values set to 0 for pixels below the threshold value, and 1 for pixels greater than or equal to the threshold value.

column2: 以重複模式平鋪圖像。它還有一個裁剪選項，通過定義圖像左，右，底部和頂部邊緣的位置來裁剪圖像。
column3: Tiles images in a repeating pattern. It also has a Crop option which crops an image by defining the position of the left, right, bottom, and top edges of the image.

column2: 合併存儲在紋理3D TOP中的圖像序列中的像素。 “變形”在空間上（在xy中）扭曲圖像，而Time Machine僅在時間上扭曲圖像。
column3: Combines pixels in a sequence of images stored in a Texture 3D TOP . Whereas "morphing" warps an image "spatially" (in xy), Time Machine warps images only in time.

column2: 將2D變換應用於TOP圖像，如平移，縮放，旋轉和多重複平鋪。背景可以填充純色和alpha。
column3: Applies 2D transformations to a TOP image like translate, scale, rotate, and multi-repeat tiling. The background can be filled with solid color and alpha.

column2: 將Input1'置於'Input2下。 Input2的alpha用於確定Input1圖像的哪些部分在結果中可見。
column3: Places Input1 'under' Input2. The alpha of Input2 is used to determine what parts of the Input1 image are visible in the result.

column2: 允許您通過使用C ++編寫自己的.dll來製作自定義TOP運算符。注意：CPlusPlus TOP僅適用於TouchDesigner Commercial和TouchDesigner Pro。
column3: Allows you to make custom TOP operators by writing your own .dll using C++. Note : The CPlusPlus TOP is only available in TouchDesigner Commercial and TouchDesigner Pro .

column2: 在NVIDIA GPU上運行CUDA程序（8000系列及更高版本，此處為完整列表）。使用CUDA TOP，你需要編寫一個CUDA DLL。
column3: Runs a CUDA program on a NVIDIA GPU (8000 series and later, full list here ). The use a CUDA TOP, you'll need to write a CUDA DLL .

column2: 從指定的渲染TOP中描述的場景中讀取包含深度信息的圖像。在表面處於近深度值（攝像機參數“近”）的像素處，得到的圖像為黑色（0）。
column3: Reads an image containing depth information from a scene described in a specified Render TOP . The resulting image is black (0) at pixels where the surface is at the near depth value (Camera's parameter "Near").

column2: 將TOP流保存為各種格式的QuickTime或MP4（.mp4）電影，以及動畫，Cineform和Hap Q視頻編解碼器。
column3: Saves a TOP stream out to a QuickTime or MP4 ( .mp4 ) movie in a variety of formats, plus the Animation, Cineform and Hap Q video codecs.

column2: 可以將任何其他運算符的節點查看器顯示為TOP圖像。如果操作員源是Panel Component，則還支持通過TOP圖像進行面板交互。
column3: Can display the Node Viewer for any other operator as a TOP image. If the operator source is a Panel Component, panel interaction through the TOP image is also supported.

column2: 用於在TouchDesigner中渲染所有3D場景。您需要至少為它提供一個Camera對象和一個Geometry對象。
column3: Is used to render all 3D scenes in TouchDesigner. You need to give it a Camera object and a Geometry object as a minimum.

column2: 與Render TOP一起使用以實現多通道渲染。它可以通過使用幀緩衝區中的現有深度/顏色信息來構建其輸入渲染，或者可以選擇在渲染之前清除一個或兩個深度/顏色緩衝區。
column3: Is used along with a Render TOP to achieve multipass rendering. It can build upon its inputs render by using the existing depth/color information in the framebuffers, or it can optionally clear one or both of the depth/color buffers before it does its render.

column2: 允許您從任何渲染TOP中選擇一個顏色緩衝區。
column3: Allows you to select one of the color buffers from any Render TOP .

column2: 是僅限TouchDesigner Pro的操作員。 SDI Out TOP使用Nvidia的SDI輸出卡將視頻幀直接輸出到輸出卡，避免任何涉及Windows的問題，如vsync，桌面撕裂等。
column3: Is a TouchDesigner Pro only operator. The SDI Out TOP uses Nvidia's SDI Output card to output video frames directly to the output card, avoid any issues involved with Windows such as vsync, desktop tearing etc.

column2: 在Render TOP或Render Pass TOP的輸出上執行屏幕空間環境光遮擋。由於此技術需要訪問深度緩衝區，因此Render / RenderPass TOP和SSAO TOP之間不能有其他TOP。
column3: Performs Screen Space Ambient Occlusion on the output of a Render TOP or Render Pass TOP . Because this technique requires access to the Depth Buffer, no other TOP can be in between the Render/RenderPass TOP and the SSAO TOP.

column2: Anti-Alias TOP使用屏幕空間抗鋸齒技術稱為“SMAA：增強的亞像素形態抗鋸齒”？
column3: The Anti-Alias TOP uses a screen space antialiasing technique called `SMAA: Enhanced Subpixel Morphological Antialiasing?

column2: 顯示圖像中的文本字符串。它允許多種字體，大小，顏色，邊框，字符分隔和線條分離。
column3: Displays text strings in an image. It allows for multiple fonts, sizes, colors, borders, character separation and line separation.

column2: 讀取圖像數據將通過Touch Out TOP通過TCP / IP網絡連接發送。另一個TouchDesigner進程可以位於同一台計算機上，也可以位於連接網絡上任何位置的另一台計算機上。
column3: Will read in image data send over a TCP/IP network connection from a Touch Out TOP . The other TouchDesigner process can be on the same computer or from another computer anywhere on the connected network.

column2: 通過TCP / IP將TOP圖像流發送到Touch In TOP。 Touch In TOP可以位於同一台計算機上的另一個TouchDesigner會話中，也可以位於連接網絡上任何位置的計算機上。
column3: Sends a TOP image stream over TCP/IP to a Touch In TOP. The Touch In TOP can be in another TouchDesigner session on the same computer or on a computer anywhere on the connected network.

column2: 可用於從連接到系統的外部攝像頭，採集卡或DV解碼器捕獲視頻。
column3: Can be used to capture video from an external camera, capture card, or DV decoder connected to the system.

column2: 使用本機驅動程序庫將視頻路由到輸出設備。目前支持的設備：Blackmagic Design設備Video Device Out TOP僅適用於Commercial和Pro。
column3: Routes video to output devices using their native driver libraries. Devices currently supported: Blackmagic Design devices The Video Device Out TOP is only available in Commercial and Pro .

column2: 創建RTSP服務器以通過網絡發送H.264視頻和MP3音頻。它使用Nvidia的硬件H264編碼器來實現低延遲編碼。
column3: Creates an RTSP server to send H.264 video and MP3 audio across the network. It uses Nvidia's hardware H264 encoder to achieve low-latency encoding.

column2: 在材質上呈現恆定顏色。要應用紋理，請使用Phong MAT並將Diffuse和Specular參數的顏色設置為（0,0,0），然後使用Emit參數設置顏色，如果要應用紋理，則使用Color Map。
column3: Renders a constant color on a material. To apply a texture, use a Phong MAT and set the color for Diffuse and Specular parameters to (0,0,0), then use the Emit parameters to set color, and the Color Map if you want to apply a texture.

column2: Depth Only MAT可用於通過在Z中製作隱形屏障來防止繪製對象。
column3: The Depth Only MAT can be used to prevent objects from being drawn by making an invisible barrier in Z.

column2: 允許您在TouchDesigner中編寫或導入自定義材料。當GLSL著色器中存在編譯錯誤時，將顯示藍色/紅色棋盤錯誤著色器。
column3: Allows you to write or import custom materials into TouchDesigner. When there are compile errors in a GLSL shader, a blue/red checkerboard error shader will be displayed.

column2: 做得不多，但在構建網絡時派上用場。
column3: Doesn't do much but comes in handy when building networks.

column2: 使用Phong Shading模型創建材質。它支持紋理，反射，凸起，錐形燈，邊緣燈，alpha貼圖等。
column3: Creates a material using the Phong Shading model. It has support for textures, reflections, bumps, cone lights, rim lights, alpha maps and more.

column2: 允許您控制Point Sprites的某些屬性（使用粒子SOP或DAT到SOP可創建）。
column3: Allows you to control some attributes of Point Sprites (creatable using the Particle SOP or DAT to SOP ).

column2: 從項目中的任何位置抓取另一種材料。
column3: Grabs another material from any location in the project.

column2: 允許在2個材料輸入之間切換。
column3: Allows switching between 2 material inputs.

column2: 將多邊形和曲線的邊緣渲染為線條。
column3: Renders the edges of polygons and curves as lines.

column2: 既可以自己創建新的點和多邊形，也可以用於將點和多邊形添加到現有輸入。
column3: Can both create new Points and Polygons on its own, or it can be used to add Points and Polygons to an existing input.

column2: 通過沿任何軸點平移或旋轉每個圖元，將一組圖元彼此對齊或與輔助輸入對齊。
column3: Aligns a group of primitives to each other or to an auxiliary input, by translating or rotating each primitive along any pivot point.

column2: 允許您向幾何體添加法線或切線。
column3: Allows you to add normals or tangents to geometry.

column2: 允許您手動重命名和刪除點和基元屬性。
column3: Allows you to manually rename and delete point and primitive attributes.

column2: 提供一組適用於樣條曲線和曲面的參數空間的操作。參數空間，也稱為NURBS或Bzier基元的“域”，在U方向上由一個基礎定義，如果基元是表面，則在V方向上定義另一個基礎。
column3: Provides a set of operations applicable to the parametric space of spline curves and surfaces. The parametric space, also known as the "domain" of a NURBS or Bzier primitive, is defined by one basis in the U direction and, if the primitive is a surface, another basis in the V direction.

column2: 在具有相同拓撲的形狀之間提供3D變形。它可以使用每個輸入的相應通道的平均權重在16個輸入SOP之間進行混合。
column3: Provides 3D metamorphosis between shapes with the same topology. It can blend between sixteen input SOPs using the average weight of each input's respective channel.

column2: 通過公共骨骼（共享骨骼）對基元進行分組。有關使用“骨骼組”來變形幾何體的更多信息，請參閱以下文章：Deforming_Geometry_（蒙皮）。
column3: Groups primitives by common bones (shared bones). For more information regarding using Bone Groups for deforming geometry, see this article: Deforming_Geometry_(Skinning) .

column2: 採用兩個閉合的多邊形集合A和B.將這些源設置為具有您希望操作的3D形狀的SOP。
column3: Takes two closed polygonal sets, A and B. Set these Sources to the SOPs with the 3D shapes that you wish to operate on.

column2: 創建長方體。這些可以單獨用作幾何形狀，或者可以細分它們以與萊迪思SOP一起使用。
column3: Creates cuboids. These can be used as geometries by themselves, or they can be sub-divided for use with the Lattice SOP.

column2: 適用於修剪修剪過的表面，孔洞，在手臂和身體，樹枝或管道交叉點之間創建高度可控的連接。
column3: Is useful for skinning trimmed surfaces, holes, creating highly controllable joins between arms and body, branches or tube intersections.

column2: 在緩存中收集其輸入幾何，以便更快地隨機訪問多個SOP。當SOP鏈的烹飪時間很長並且需要更快的播放時，應該使用它。
column3: Collects its input geometry in a cache for faster random-access playback of multiple SOPs. It should be used when cook times for a chain of SOP s is long and a quicker playback is needed.

column2: 用於封閉帶有扁平或圓形覆蓋物的開放區域。通過沿U或V方向延伸網格來限製網格（例如，
column3: Is used to close open areas with flat or rounded coverings. Meshes are capped by extending the mesh in either the U or V direction (e.

column2: 適用於任何面或表麵類型，即多邊形，Bzier或NURBS。它可用於切割基元，將其切割成多個部分，或從中提取點或橫截面。
column3: Works with any face or surface type, be that polygon, Bzier, or NURBS. It can be used to slice a primitive, cut it into multiple sections, or extract points or cross-sections from it.

column2: 採用CHOP通道並在SOP中生成3D多邊形。它從CHOP讀取樣本數據並將其轉換為點位置和點屬性。
column3: Takes CHOP channels and generates 3D polygons in a SOP. It reads sample data from a CHOP and converts it into point positions and point attributes.

column2: 創建開弧或閉弧，圓和橢圓。如果兩個非理性的NURBS圓（即它們的X和Y半徑不相等）被蒙皮，則可能產生比預期更多的等參線。
column3: Creates open or closed arcs, circles and ellipses. If two NURBS circles that are non-rational (i.e. their X and Y radii are unequal) are skinned, more isoparms may be generated than expected.

column2: 通過拉動直接位於其上的點來使面和表面變形。與操縱控制點（CV）的Point SOP或其他SOP相反，Clay SOP對原始輪廓本身進行操作，提供了一種直接，直觀且不受約束的重塑幾何形狀的方法。
column3: Deforms faces and surfaces by pulling points that lie directly on them. As opposed to the Point SOP or other SOPs that manipulate control points (CVs), the Clay SOP operates on the primitive contours themselves, providing a direct, intuitive, and unconstrained way of reshaping geometry.

column2: 使用平面切割和摺痕源幾何。
column3: Cuts and creases source geometry with a plane.

column2: 將幾何從一種幾何類型轉換為另一種類型。類型包括多邊形，網格，Bezier patche，粒子和球體基元。
column3: Converts geometry from one geometry type to another type. Types include polygon, mesh, Bezier patche, particle and sphere primitive.

column2: 允許您沿PathInput幾何體的曲面變形和動畫源輸入幾何體。
column3: Lets you deform and animate Source Input geometry along the surface of the PathInput geometry.

column2: 定義捕獲區域（cregion），這是一種原始類型，可以被認為是一個修改過的管基元（兩端都有半個球體的管）。
column3: Defines capture region (cregion), which is a type of primitive which can be thought of as a modified tube primitive (a tube with half a sphere on either end).

column2: 類似於Clay SOP，您不是通過修改CV而是通過直接操作曲面來變形樣條曲面。
column3: Is similar to the Clay SOP in that you deform a spline surface not by modifying the CVs but by directly manipulating the surface.

column2: 查找兩個或多個面（多邊形，Bziers和NURBS曲線）之間或面與多邊形或樣條曲面之間的最小距離的交點或點。
column3: Finds the intersections or the points of minimum distance between two or more faces (polygons, Bziers, and NURBS curves) or between faces and a polygonal or spline surface.

column2: 分割輸入的多邊形幾何。它將使用Bricker選項平滑輸入多邊形，劃分多邊形以及細分輸入多邊形。
column3: Divides incoming polygonal geometry. It will smooth input polygons, dividing polygons, as well as sub-divide input polygons using the Bricker option.

column2: 可用於：擠出和斜切文本和其他幾何形狀斜切邊緣以獲得銳利邊緣使基本體更厚或更薄為了做到這一點，它使用表面法線來確定擠出方向。
column3: Can be used for: Extruding and bevelling Text and other geometry Cusping the bevelled edges to get sharp edges Making primitives thicker or thinner In order to do so, it uses the normal of the surface to determine the direction of extrusion.

column2: 允許您控制給定對象的刻面的平滑度。它還可以讓您合併點或曲面法線。
column3: Lets you control the smoothness of faceting of a given object. It also lets you consolidate points or surface normals.

column2: 允許您讀取以前在模型編輯器中創建的幾何文件，從SOP輸出幾何體或從其他軟件（如Houdini）生成的幾何體文件。
column3: Allows you to read a geometry file that may have been previously created in the Model Editor, output geometry from a SOP, or generated from other software such as Houdini .

column2: 用於在兩條曲線/多邊形或兩個曲面/網格之間創建平滑的橋接幾何體。 Filleting在每個輸入對之間創建一個新原語，並且永遠不會影響原始形狀。
column3: Is used to create smooth bridging geometry between two curves / polygons or two surfaces / meshes. Filleting creates a new primitive between each input pair and never affects the original shapes.

column2: 使樣條曲線適合一系列點或樣條曲面到m X n網點。任何類型的面或表面都代表有效的輸入。
column3: Fits a Spline curve to a sequence of points or a Spline surface to an m X n mesh of points. Any type of face or surface represents a valid input.

column2: 允許您從Adobe Type 1 Postscript字體在模型中創建文本。要安裝字體，請將字體文件複製到安裝路徑的$ TFS / touch / fonts目錄中。
column3: Allows you to create text in your model from Adobe Type 1 Postscript Fonts. To install fonts, copy the font files to the $TFS/touch/fonts directory of your installation path.

column2: 將力屬性添加到輸入元球場，粒子SOP或Spring SOP將其用作吸引力或排斥力場。
column3: Adds force attributes to the input metaball field that is used by either Particle SOP or Spring SOP as attractor or repulsion force fields.

column2: 允許您創建輸入幾何體的鋸齒狀山狀分割。它將沿指定的法向量（方向xyz場）或輸入幾何的頂點法線創建隨機看起來的偏差和子劃分。
column3: Allows you created jagged mountain-like divisions of the input geometry. It will create random-looking deviations and sub-divisions along either a specified normal vector (the Direction xyz fields) or the vertex normals of the input geometry.

column2: 允許您使用多邊形，網格，Bzier和NURBS曲面或使用開放多邊形的多條線創建網格和矩形。
column3: Allows you to create grids and rectangles using polygons, a mesh, Bzier and NURBS surfaces, or multiple lines using open polygons.

column2: 即使它們不在同一平面上，也可以在面被封閉的地方打洞。它還可以從輸入幾何體中刪除現有孔。
column3: Is for making holes where faces are enclosed, even if they are not in the same plane. It can also remove existing holes from the input geometry.

column2: 在Component中創建SOP輸入。組件輸入以字母數字的形式定位在節點的左側。
column3: Creates a SOP input in a Component. Component inputs are positioned alphanumerically on the left side of the node.

column2: 使用隱式函數創建12年級函數和關係教科書中的等軸曲面的3D可視化。
column3: Uses implicit functions to create 3D visualizations of isometric surfaces found in Grade 12 Functions and Relations textbooks.

column2: 將一系列面或曲面連接到一個繼承其屬性的基元。不同類型的面可以連接在一起，表面也可以連接在一起。
column3: Connects a sequence of faces or surfaces into a single primitive that inherits their attributes. Faces of different types can be joined together, and so can surfaces.

column2: 通過在每對輸入圓之間創建一系列圓圈，有助於創建基於圓的骨架。
column3: Will aid in the creation of circle-based skeletons by creating a series of circles between each pair of input circles.

column2: 允許您通過操作網格或包含輸入源幾何體的細分框來創建其輸入幾何體的動畫變形。
column3: Allows you to create animated deformations of its input geometry by manipulating grids or a subdivided box that encloses the input source's geometry.

column2: 創建直線。
column3: Creates straight lines.

column2: 這是不尋常的，因為它實際上並沒有改變任何幾何形狀。相反，它為輸入對象構建了一個詳細級別的緩存。
column3: Is unusual in so far as it does not actually alter any geometry. Instead it builds a level of detail cache for the input object.

column2: Lsystem SOP實現L系統（Lindenmayer系統，以Aristid Lindenmayer（1925-1989）命名），允許通過使用迭代來定義復雜形狀。
column3: The Lsystem SOP implements L-systems (Lindenmayer-systems, named after Aristid Lindenmayer (1925-1989)), allow definition of complex shapes through the use of iteration.

column2: 允許您使用由元球場定義的影響“磁場”來影響輸入幾何體的變形。
column3: Allows you to affect deformations of the input geometry with another object using a "magnetic field" of influence, defined by a metaball field.

column2: 允許在SOP級別將材料（MAT）分配給幾何體。注意：“對象組件”中的“材質”參數將覆蓋使用“材質SOP”指定給幾何體的材質屬性。
column3: Allows the assignment of materials (MATs) to geometry at the SOP level. Note: The Material parameter in Object Components will override material attributes assigned to geometry using the Material SOP.

column2: 合併來自多個SOP的幾何體。
column3: Merges geometry from multiple SOPs.

column2: 創建metaballs和meta-superquadric曲面。 Metaballs可以被認為是球形力場，其表面是在力場密度等於某個閾值的任何點處定義的隱函數。
column3: Creates metaballs and meta-superquadric surfaces. Metaballs can be thought of as spherical force fields whose surface is an implicit function defined at any point where the density of the force field equals a certain threshold.

column2: 在TouchDesigner中保存曲面建模器。它旨在保存使用SOP編輯器（aka Modeler）構建的原始模型幾何體。
column3: Holds the surface modeler in TouchDesigner. It is designed to hold raw model geometry constructed using the SOP Editor (aka Modeler).

column2: 使用噪聲模式替換幾何點。它使用與Noise CHOP相同的數學運算。
column3: Displaces geometry points using noise patterns. It uses the same math as the Noise CHOP .

column2: 對幾何體沒有影響。它是與其輸入相關的SOP實例。在參考SOP網絡時經常使用Null SOP，允許將新的SOP添加到網絡（上游）而無需更新參考。
column3: Has no effect on the geometry. It is an instance of the SOP connected to its input. The Null SOP is often used when making reference to a SOP network, allowing new SOPs to be added to the network (upstream) without the need to update the reference.

column2: 用於在Component中創建SOP輸出。組件輸出以字母數字的形式定位在組件的右側。
column3: Is used to create a SOP output in a Component. Component outputs are positioned alphanumerically on the right side of the Component.

column2: 用於創建和控製粒子系統模擬的“粒子”運動。粒子系統通常用於創建自然事件的模擬，例如雨雪，或煙花和火花等效果。
column3: Is used for creating and controlling motion of "particles" for particle systems simulations. Particle systems are often used to create simulations of natural events such as rain and snow, or effects such as fireworks and sparks.

column2: 允許您直接進入幾何體並操縱源中的點的位置，顏色，紋理坐標和法線以及其他屬性。
column3: Allows you to get right down into the geometry and manipulate the position, color, texture coordinates, and normals of the points in the Source, and other attributes.

column2: 通過連接（即放樣/縫合）開放或閉合面的點而不添加任何新點來生成三角形網格。
column3: Generates meshes of triangles by connecting (i.e. lofting/stitching) the points of open or closed faces without adding any new points.

column2: 從網格圖元或一組面（多邊形，NURBS或貝塞爾曲線）創建平滑多邊形貼片。
column3: Creates a smooth polygonal patch from a mesh primitive or a set of faces (polygons, NURBS or Bezier curves).

column2: 使樣條曲線適合多邊形或外殼，並輸出該樣條曲線的多邊形近似值。您可以選擇在原始點之間創建分割，或者忽略原始點的位置，並將形狀劃分為相等長度的分段。
column3: Fits a spline curve to a polygon or hull and outputs a polygonal approximation of that spline. You can choose either to create divisions between the original points, or to ignore the position of the original points and divide the shape into segments of equal lengths.

column2: 嘗試將多邊形表面縫合在一起，從而消除因在不同細節水平下評估表面而產生的裂縫。
column3: Attempts to stitch polygonal surfaces together, thereby eliminating cracks that result from evaluating the surfaces at differing levels of detail.

column2: 啟用配置文件的提取和操作。在項目SOP之後，您通常需要Trim SOP，Bridge SOP或Profile SOP。
column3: Enables the extraction and manipulation of profiles. You will usually need a Trim SOP, Bridge SOP, or Profile SOP after a Project SOP .

column2: 通過將3D面投影到樣條曲面上來創建曲面上的曲線（也稱為修剪或輪廓曲線），就像光線將2D陰影投射到3D曲面上一樣。
column3: Creates curves on surface (also known as trim or profile curves) by projecting a 3D face onto a spline surface, much like a light casts a 2D shadow onto a 3D surface.

column2: 通過拉伸兩個導軌之間的橫截面來生成曲面。這類似於Sweep SOP，但它可以更好地控制橫截面的方向和縮放。
column3: Generates surfaces by stretching cross-sections between two rails. This is similar to the Sweep SOP, but it gives more control over the orientation and scaling of the cross-sections.

column2: 用於將一個表面投影到另一個表面上。從輸入幾何的每個點沿其法線方向投射光線。
column3: Is used to project one surface onto another. Rays are projected from each point of the input geometry in the direction of its normal.

column2: 允許您在不更改其形狀的情況下增加任何NURBS，Bzier或多邊形曲面或面的CV數。
column3: Allows you to increase the number of CVs in any NURBS, Bzier, or polygonal surface or face without changing its shape.

column2: 將一個或多個基元重新採樣為偶數段。它僅適用於多邊形，因此當呈現NURBS或Bzier曲線輸入時，它首先使用Level of Detail參數將其轉換為多邊形。
column3: Will resample one or more primitives into even length segments. It only applies to polygons so when presented with a NURBS or Bzier curve input, it first converts it to polygons using the Level of Detail parameter.

column2: 旋轉面部以創造革命的表面。旋轉的方向和原點由引導幾何體表示，類似於粗線，中心有十字線。
column3: Revolves faces to create a surface of revolution. The revolution's direction and origin are represented by guide geometry that resembles a thick line with a cross hair at the centre.

column2: 允許您在形狀和插值點位置，顏色，點法線和形狀之間的紋理坐標之間進行3D變形。
column3: Allows you do 3D Metamorphosis between shapes and Interpolate point position, colors, point normals, and texture coordinates between shapes.

column2: 每次腳本SOP烹飪時運行腳本。默認情況下，腳本SOP是使用包含三個Python方法的停靠DAT創建的：cook，onPulse和setupParameters。
column3: Runs a script each time the Script SOP cooks. By default, the Script SOP is created with a docked DAT that contains three Python methods: cook, onPulse, and setupParameters .

column2: 允許您從TouchDesigner中的任何其他位置引用SOP。為了節省內存，Select SOP創建SOP引用的實例。
column3: Allows you to reference a SOP from any other location in TouchDesigner. To save memory, the Select SOP creates an instance of the SOP references.

column2: 採取任意數量的面孔並在其上構建皮膚表面。但是，如果給定兩個或更多個曲面，則SOP構建四個蒙皮，每組邊界曲線一個。
column3: Takes any number of faces and builds a skin surface over them. If given two or more surfaces, however, the SOP builds four skins, one for each set of boundary curves.

column2: 生成不同幾何類型的球形對象。它能夠創建所有幾何類型的非均勻可伸縮球體。
column3: Generates spherical objects of different geometry types. It is capable of creating non-uniform scalable spheres of all geometry types.

column2: 使用多邊形邊緣上的彈簧“力”和連接到每個點的質量來變形和移動輸入幾何體。
column3: Deforms and moves the input geometry using spring "forces" on the edges of polygons and on masses attached to each point.

column2: 用於拉伸兩條曲線或曲面以覆蓋平滑區域。它還可用於製造某些類型的軟墊面料，如靠墊和降落傘。
column3: Is used to stretch two curves or surfaces to cover a smooth area. It can also be used to create certain types of upholstered fabrics such as cushions and parachutes.

column2: 採用輸入多邊形曲面（可以通過管道輸入一個或兩個輸入），並使用Catmull-Clark細分算法劃分每個面以創建平滑的多邊形曲面。
column3: Takes an input polygon surface (which can be piped into one or both inputs), and divides each face to create a smoothed polygon surface using a Catmull-Clark subdivision algorithm.

column2: 生成isoquadric表面。這產生了一個類似於元球的球形，不同之處在於它不會改變它的形狀以響應周圍的形狀。
column3: Generates an isoquadric surface. This produces a spherical shape that is similar to a metaball, with the difference that it doesn't change it's shape in response to what surrounds it.

column2: 使用NURBS和Bezier曲面執行布爾運算，或僅生成曲面相交的輪廓。
column3: Performs boolean operations with NURBS and Bezier surfaces, or only generates profiles where the surfaces intersect.

column2: 沿著Backbone Source基元在橫截面輸入中掃描基元，創建帶狀和管狀形狀。
column3: Sweeps primitives in the Cross-section input along Backbone Source primitive(s), creating ribbon and tube-like shapes.

column2: 在最多9999個可能的輸入之間切換。此SOP的輸出由“選擇輸入”字段指定。
column3: Switches between up to 9999 possible inputs. The output of this SOP is specified by the Select Input field.

column2: 生成圓環形狀的完整或特定部分（如甜甜圈）。
column3: Generates complete or specific sections of torus shapes (like a doughnut).

column2: 讀取圖像文件並自動跟踪圖像文件，在超過特定亮度閾值的區域周圍生成一組面。
column3: Reads an image file and automatically traces it, generating a set of faces around areas exceeding a certain brightness threshold.

column2: 採用輸入SOP並在過去幾幀中對輸入SOP的每個點進行跟踪，並以不同方式連接路徑。
column3: Takes an input SOP and makes a trail of each point of the input SOP over the past several frames, and connects the trails in different ways.

column2: 切除樣條曲面的一部分，或展開先前切割的碎片。當一部分錶面被修剪時，它實際上並未從表面上移除;相反，那部分是不可見的。
column3: Cuts out parts of a spline surface, or uncuts previously cut pieces. When a portion of the surface is trimmed, it is not actually removed from the surface; instead, that part is made invisible.

column2: 將幾何轉換為三角形條。三角形條帶比常規三角形或四邊形更快。
column3: Convert geometry into triangle strips. Triangle strips are faster to render than regular triangles or quads.

column2: 沿X，Y或Z軸生成開放或封閉的管，錐體或金字塔。它輸出為網格，多邊形或簡單的管基元。
column3: Generates open or closed tubes, cones, or pyramids along the X, Y or Z axes. It outputs as meshes, polygons or simply a tube primitive .

column2: 執行非線性變形，如彎曲，線性錐度，剪切，擠壓和拉伸，錐度和扭曲。
column3: Performs non-linear deformations such as bend, linear taper, shear, squash and stretch, taper and twist.

column2: 允許您在每個頂點（而不是每個點）的基礎上編輯/創建屬性。它在這方麵類似於Point SOP。
column3: Allows you to edit/create attributes on a per-vertex (rather than per-point) basis. It is similar to the Point SOP in this respect.

column2: 將邊緣轉換為管道並指向球體，從而在渲染中創建線框結構的外觀。
column3: Converts edges to tubes and points to spheres, creating the look of a wire frame structure in renderings.

column2: 為手臂創建所有必需的幾何形狀，並提供平滑，無扭曲的皮膚，將手臂連接到身體。
column3: Creates all the necessary geometry for an arm, and provides a smooth, untwisted skin that connects the arm to the body.

column2: 用於對幾何體中的點進行加權以捕獲區域。加權方案將在下一節“捕獲區域SOP”中介紹。
column3: Is used to weight points in a geometry to capture regions. The weighting scheme is described in the next section, Capture Region SOP .

column2: 允許您複製其他SOP的幾何圖形，並對每個副本應用轉換。它還允許您將幾何體複製到輸入模板上的點。
column3: Lets you make copies of the geometry of other SOPs and apply a transformation to each copy. It also allows you to copy geometry to points on an input template.

column2: 可用於從DAT表創建幾何圖形，或者如果指定了SOP輸入，則可以修改現有幾何圖形上的屬性。
column3: Can be used to create geometry from DAT tables, or if a SOP input is specified, to modify attributes on existing geometry.

column2: 採用幾何點和點權重（由Capture SOP指定）並在移動捕獲區域時變形幾何體。
column3: Takes geometry along with point weights (assigned by the Capture SOP ) and deforms geometry as Capture Regions are moved.

column2: 通過使用三個選項中的任意一個刪除由組規範或幾何選擇選擇的輸入幾何：按實體編號，按邊界體積和按實體（原始/點）法線。
column3: Deletes input geometry as selected by a group specification or a geometry selection by using either of the three selection options: by entity number, by a bounding volume, and by entity (primitive/point) normals.

column2: 根據各種標準生成點或基元組，並允許您對這些組進行操作。
column3: Generates groups of points or primitives according to various criteria and allows you to act upon these groups.

column2: 從逆向曲線CHOP中獲取數據並從中構建曲線。
column3: Takes data from an Inverse Curve CHOP and builds a curve from it.

column2: 通過CHOP為其提供樣品創建幾何體。它在樣本中的每個點創建幾何。
column3: Creates geometry from samples fed to it by CHOPs . It creates geometry at every point in the sample.

column2: 從曲線擠出表面。該線可以是多邊形，NURBS或Bezier幾何類型。
column3: Extrudes a surface from a curved line. The line can be of polygon, NURBS, or Bezier geometry type.

column2: 允許您合併跨越不同組件的多個SOP的幾何。
column3: Allows you to merge the geometry of several SOPs spanning different components.

column2: 將高細節多邊形模型減少為由較少多邊形組成的模型。第二個輸入的多邊形表示要素邊。
column3: Reduces a high detail polygonal model into one consisting of fewer polygons. The second input's polygons represent feature edges.

column2: 就像Point SOP一樣，除了原始特定的屬性（如反轉原始法線）之外，還可以操縱基元的位置，大小，方向，顏色，alpha。
column3: Is like the Point SOP but manipulates a primitive 's position, size, orientation, color, alpha, in addition to primitive-specific attributes, such as reversing primitive normals.

column2: 創建一個4邊多邊形。它是一個平面。
column3: Creates a 4-sided polygon. It is a planar surface.

column2: 允許您以不同方式對點和基元進行排序。有時基元按所需順序排列，但點順序不是。
column3: Allows you to sort points and primitives in different ways. Sometimes the primitives are arranged in the desired order, but the point order is not.

column2: 在由XYZ CHOP參數中引用的CHOP定義的點位置處創建幾何（四精靈）。
column3: Creates geometry (quad sprites) at point positions defined by the CHOP referenced in the XYZ CHOP parameter.

column2: 從系統上安裝的任何TrueType字體或磁盤上的任何TrueType字體文件創建文本幾何。
column3: Creates text geometry from any TrueType font that is installed on the system, or any TrueType font file on disk.

column2: 將紋理UV和W坐標指定給Source幾何體，以用於紋理和凹凸貼圖。它生成多層紋理坐標。
column3: Assigns texture UV and W coordinates to the Source geometry for use in texture and bump mapping. It generates multi-layers of texture coordinates.

column2: 在“對象空間”中轉換，旋轉和縮放輸入幾何體或在SOP中本地縮放輸入幾何體。模型編輯器和變換SOP都在“對象空間”中工作，並更改點的X Y Z位置。
column3: Translates, rotates and scales the input geometry in "object space" or local to the SOP. The Model Editor and the Transform SOP both work in "object space", and change the X Y Z positions of the points.

column2: 將文本格式從簡單文本更改為表格形式，反之亦然。
column3: Changes the text format from simple text to table form and vice-versa.

column2: 使用字符串編輯和數學表達式更改傳入DAT的單元格。它輸出一個具有相同行數和列數的表。
