column3: Changes the cells of the incoming DAT using string-editing and math expressions. It outputs a table with the same number of rows and columns.

column2: 允許您檢查操作員的python存儲，本地，全局，表達式和擴展。
column3: Lets you inspect an operator's python storage, locals, globals, expressions, and extensions.

column2: 讀入.txt文本文件和.dat表文件。它將嘗試將任何其他文件作為原始文本讀取。該文件可以位於磁盤上或Web上。
column3: Reads in .txt text files and .dat table files. It will attempt to read any other file as raw text. The file can be located on disk or on the web.

column2: 允許您將DAT內容寫入.dat文件或.txt文件。 .dat文件是TouchDesigner的文件類型之一，用於保存表DAT的數組。
column3: Allows you to write out DAT contents to a .dat file or a .txt file. A .dat file is one of the File Types of TouchDesigner that is used to hold the arrays of the Table DAT .

column2: 列出文件系統文件夾中的文件和子文件夾，並監視所有更改。對於找到的每個項目，在表格中創建一行，其中包含以下信息的可選列：名稱擴展名類型大小深度文件夾路徑日期創建日期已修改。
column3: Lists the files and subfolders found in a file system folder and monitors any changes. For each item found, a row is created in the table with optional columns for the following information: Name Extension Type Size Depth Folder Path Date Created Date Modified.

column2: 用於在Component中創建DAT輸入。組件輸入以字母數字的形式定位在組件的左側。
column3: Is used to create a DAT input in a Component. Component inputs are positioned alphanumerically on the left side of the Component.

column2: 提供有關節點的字符串信息。只有一些節點包含可由Info DAT訪問的其他字符串信息。
column3: Gives you string information about a node. Only some nodes contain additional string information which can be accessed by the Info DAT.

column2: 允許您將行或列插入現有表。如果輸入DAT不是表，則將其轉換為表。
column3: Allows you to insert a row or column into an existing table.  If the input DAT is not a table, it will be converted to a table.

column2: Merged DAT是一個多輸入DAT，它將來自輸入DAT的文本或表合併在一起。
column3: The Merged DAT is a multi-input DAT which merges the text or tables from the input DATs together.

column2: 對數據沒有影響。它是連接到其輸入的DAT的實例。 Null DAT通常在引用DAT網絡時使用，允許將新DAT添加到網絡（上游），而無需更新引用。
column3: Has no effect on the data. It is an instance of the DAT connected to its input. The Null DAT is often used when making reference to a DAT network, allowing new DATs to be added to the network (upstream) without the need to update the reference.

column2: 遍歷組件層次結構，從一個組件開始，查看該組件中的所有節點，並輸出一個表，每個節點有一行符合用戶選擇的條件。
column3: Traverses the component hierarchy starting at one component and looking at all nodes within that component, and outputs a table with one row per node that matches criteria the user chooses.

column2: 用於在Component中創建DAT輸出。組件輸出以字母數字的形式定位在組件的右側。
column3: Is used to create a DAT output in a Component. Component outputs are positioned alphanumerically on the right side of the Component.

column2: 以表DAT格式記錄各種性能時間。這些基準測試與性能監視器報告的基準測試類似。
column3: Logs various performance times in a Table DAT format. These benchmarks are similar to those reported by the Performance Monitor .

column2: 允許您重新排序輸入表的行和列。您還可以使用“在指定順序”選項獲取行和列的重複副本。
column3: Allows you to reorder the rows and columns of the input table.  You can also use In Specified Order option to get duplicate copies of rows and columns.

column2: 每次腳本DAT烹飪時運行腳本。默認情況下，腳本DAT是使用包含三種Python方法的停靠DAT創建的：cook，onPulse和setupParameters。
column3: Runs a script each time the Script DAT cooks.  By default, the Script DAT is created with a docked DAT that contains three Python methods: cook, onPulse, and setupParameters .

column2: 允許您從TouchDesigner中的任何其他位置獲取DAT，並選擇行和列的任何子集（如果它是表）。
column3: Allows you to fetch a DAT from any other location in TouchDesigner, and to select any subset of rows and columns if it is a table.

column2: 將按行或列對錶DAT數據進行排序。
column3: Will sort table DAT data by row or column.

column2: 使用模式匹配和替換字符串更改傳入DAT的單元格。它輸出一個具有相同行數和列數的表。
column3: Changes the cells of the incoming DAT using pattern matching and substitution strings. It outputs a table with the same number of rows and columns.

column2: 是一個多輸入操作符，允許您使用Input參數選擇輸出哪個輸入。
column3: Is a multi-input operator which lets you choose which input is output by using the Input parameter.

column2: 將行轉換為列。行數變為列數，反之亦然。
column3: Converts rows into columns. The number of rows becomes the number of columns, and vice versa.

column2: 輪詢並列出網絡上的所有設備。
column3: Polls and lists all devices on the network.

column2: 將在指定CHOP的值更改時運行其腳本。您可以指定要查看的通道，並根據其值以各種方式更改來觸發。
column3: Will run its script when the values of a specified CHOP change. You can specify which channels to look at, and trigger based on their values changing in various ways.

column2: 允許您以表格格式將CHOP通道值轉換為DAT。
column3: Allows you to get CHOP channel values into a DAT in table format.

column2: 包含有關由Clip CHOP和Clip Blender CHOP操縱的運動剪輯的信息。 Clip DAT可以保存任何命令或腳本文本，可以根據Execute參數頁面上的設置觸發（這是Clip DAT和Text DAT不同的地方）。
column3: Contains information about motion clips that are manipulated by a Clip CHOP and Clip Blender CHOP . The Clip DAT can hold any command or script text, which can be triggered based on the settings on the Execute parameter page (This is where the Clip DAT and the Text DAT are different).

column2: 監視另一個DAT的內容，並在這些內容髮生變化時運行腳本。另一個DAT通常是一張桌子。
column3: Monitors another DAT's contents and runs a script when those contents change. The other DAT is usually a table.

column2: 列出其FIFO（先進/先出）表中最新的TouchDesigner錯誤。您可以使用某些列上的模式匹配來過濾我們的消息，例如Severity，Type和包含錯誤的節點的路徑。
column3: Lists the most recent TouchDesigner errors in its FIFO (first in/first out) table. You can filter our messages using pattern matching on some of the columns like Severity, Type and path of the node containing the error.

column2: 輪詢並列出所有連接的EtherDream設備。另請參見：EtherDream CHOP，掃描CHOP。
column3: Polls and lists all EtherDream devices connected. See also: EtherDream CHOP, Scan CHOP.

column2: 允許您編輯腳本並根據條件運行它們。它可以在每個幀的開始或結束時執行，也可以在TouchDesigner進程的開始或結束時執行。
column3: Lets you edit scripts and run them based on conditions. It can be executed at the start or end of every frame, or at the start or end of the TouchDesigner process.

column2: FIFO DAT維護表中用戶設置的最大行數。您可以使用DAT類中的appendRow（）方法添加行。達到其容量時，將刪除第一行。達到最大行數後，添加新行時將丟棄最舊的行。
column3: The FIFO DAT maintains a user-set maximum number of rows in a table. You add rows using the appendRow() method found in DAT Class. When its capacity is reached, the first row is removed. After the maximum number of rows is reached, the oldest row is discarded when a new row is added.

column2: 在表中創建一系列數字，範圍在起始值和結束值之間。這些值適合沿圖表水平軸或垂直軸顯示。
column3: Creates a series of numbers in a table, ranging between the start and end values.  These values are suitable for display along a graph horizontal or vertical axis.

column2: 列出其FIFO（先進/先出）表中的最新關鍵事件。每按一次按鍵和每個按鍵都有一行，包括Shift，Ctrl和Alt，區分左右兩側。
column3: Lists the most recent key events in its FIFO (first in/first out) table. There is one row for every key press down and every key-up, including Shift, Ctrl and Alt, with distinction between left and right side.

column2: 從所有MIDI設備記錄進入TouchDesigner的所有MIDI信息。它以表格格式輸出列：消息，類型，通道，索引，值。
column3: Logs all MIDI messages coming into TouchDesigner from all MIDI devices. It outputs columns in a table format: message, type, channel, index, value.

column2: 從指定的MIDI設備記錄進入TouchDesigner的所有MIDI信息。它以表格格式輸出列 - 消息，類型，通道，索引，值。
column3: Logs all MIDI messages coming into TouchDesigner from a specified MIDI device. It outputs columns in a table format - message, type, channel, index, value.

column2: 是關於所有當前檢測到的監視器的數據表，其中包含有關分辨率，屏幕定位，監視器名稱和描述的信息，以及指示其是否為主監視器的標誌。
column3: Is a table of data about all currently detected monitors with information on the resolution, screen positioning, monitor name and description, and a flag indicating whether it is a primary monitor or not.

column2: 用於從Windows 7+標準多點觸控API接收消息和事件。它捕獲所有消息，其中每個新消息更改其輸出的表。
column3: Is used for receiving messages and events from the Windows 7+ standard multi-touch API. It captures all the messages, where each new message changes the table it outputs.

column2: 運算符狀態更改時運行腳本。 OP Execute DAT是使用默認的python方法佔位符創建的。
column3: Runs a script when the state of an operator changes. OP Execute DATs are created with default python method placeholders.

column2: 使用UDP接收和解析完整的Open Sound Control數據包。解析每個數據包並將其作為一行附加到DAT表中。
column3: Receives and parses full Open Sound Control packets using UDP.  Each packet is parsed and appended as a row in the DAT's table.

column2: 用於通過遠程計算機之間的OSC連接發送信息。使用send命令啟動數據輸出。
column3: Is used for sending information over a OSC connection between remotely located computers. Use the send Command to initiate the data output.

column2: 將在指定面板組件的值更改時運行其腳本。您可以指定要監視的面板值，並根據其各種方式更改的值觸發腳本。
column3: Will run its script when the values of a specified panel component changes. You can specify which Panel Values to monitor, and trigger scripts based on their values changing in various ways.

column2: 當任何節點的參數改變狀態時，Parm Execute DAT運行腳本。參數可以通過4種方式觸發腳本：如果其值，表達式，導出或啟用狀態發生更改。
column3: The Parm Execute DAT runs a  script when a parameter of any node changes state. There are 4 ways a parameter can trigger the script: if its value, expression, export, or enable state changes.

column2: 允許您在3D渲染場景上進行多點觸控。它對渲染進行採樣（從Render TOP或Render Pass TOP）並從指定拾取位置的幾何體返回3D信息。
column3: Allows you to do multi-touch on a 3D rendered scene. It samples a rendering (from a Render TOP or a Render Pass TOP ) and returns 3D information from the geometry at the specified pick locations.

column2: 用於通過外部端口進行串行通信，使用R​​S-232協議。這些端口通常是9針連接器，或新機器上的USB端口。
column3: Is used for serial communication through an external port, using the RS-232 protocol.  These ports are usually a 9 pin connector, or a USB port on new machines.

column2: 允許您提取點和基元數據和屬性。數據以列的形式輸出，第一列是索引。
column3: Allows you to extract point and primitive data and attributes. Data is output in columns, with the first column being index.

column2: 接收並解析TUIO消息（通過網絡接收）到表中的列。 TUIO數據包OSC捆綁，因此TUIO數據也可以在OSC In DAT中以更原始的形式查看。
column3: Receives and parses TUIO messages (received over network) into columns in the table. TUIO packets OSC bundles, so TUIO data can also be viewed in it's more raw form in an OSC In DAT.

column2: 允許您創建一個包含行和列單元格的表格，每個單元格包含一個文本字符串。 “表格”是兩種形式的DAT之一（另一種是通過文本DAT簡單地形成“自由形式”文本的行）。
column3: Lets you create a table of rows and columns of cells, each cell containing a text string. A "table" is one of the two forms of DATs (the other being simply lines of "free-form" text via the Text DAT ).

column2: 用於通過兩台遠程計算機之間的TCP / IP連接發送和接收信息。
column3: Is used for sending and receiving information over a TCP/IP connection between two remotely located computers.

column2: 允許您編輯自由格式的多行ASCII文本。它用於腳本，GLSL著色器，註釋，XML和其他用途。
column3: Lets you edit free-form, multi-line ASCII text. It is used for scripts, GLSL shaders, notes, XML and other purposes.

column2: 通過Touch Out DAT接收整個網絡的完整表格，而不是使用其他基於網絡的DAT的消息。
column3: Receives full tables across the network from the Touch Out DAT, as opposed to messages with the other network based DATs.

column2: 通過網絡將完整的DAT表發送到另一個TouchDesigner進程中的Touch In DAT，而不是使用其他基於網絡的DAT的消息。
column3: Sends full DAT tables across the network to the Touch In DAT in another TouchDesigner process, as opposed to messages with the other network based DATs.

column2: 用於通過兩個遠程計算機之間的UDP連接接收信息。它可以捕獲所有消息而無需任何排隊或緩衝，並允許您發送任何所需的消息。
column3: Is used for receiving information over a UDP connection between two remotely located computers. It captures all the messages without any queuing or buffering, and allows you to send it any messages you want.

column2: 用於通過UDP連接向遠程計算機發送信息或從遠程計算機發送信息。
column3: Is used to send information over a UDP connection to/from a remotely-located computer.  Use the send Command in a DAT script or the textport to initiate the data output.

column2: 用於通過兩台遠程計算機之間的UDT連接接收信息。 它可以捕獲所有消息而無需任何排隊或緩衝，並允許您發送任何所需的消息。
column3: Is used for receiving information over a UDT connection between two remotely located computers. It captures all the messages without any queuing or buffering, and allows you to send it any messages you want.

column2: 用於通過遠程計算機之間的UDT連接發送信息。 使用udtoutDAT_Class發送消息。
column3: Is used for sending information over a UDT connection between remotely located computers. Send messages using the udtoutDAT_Class .

column2: 從Web連接獲取數據頁面。 數據應該是ASCII可讀的。 Web DAT將自動解壓縮任何gzip壓縮頁面傳輸。
column3: Fetches pages of data from a web connection. The data should be ASCII-readable. The Web DAT will automatically uncompress any gzip compressed page transfers.

column2: 接收和解析WebSocket消息。 WebSockets是Web服務器和客戶端使用的快速有效的雙向通信協議。
column3: Receives and parses WebSocket messages.  WebSockets are fast an efficient two way communication protocol used by web servers and clients.

column2: 可用於解析任意XML和SGML / HTML格式的數據。 格式化後，可以輸出文本的選定部分以供進一步處理。
column3: Can be used to parse arbitrary XML and SGML/HTML formatted data. Once formatted, selected sections of the text can be output for further processing.
